trans-unit.source: Popovers are opt-in for performance reasons, so you must initialize them yourself.

trans-unit.source: Popovers for .disabled or disabled elements must be triggered on a wrapper element.
trans-unit.target: 对于Popovers .disabled 或 disabled 元素必须在包装元素上触发。

trans-unit.source: Popovers must be hidden before their corresponding elements have been removed from the DOM.
trans-unit.target: Popovers必须在其对应的元素从DOM中移除之前被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Popovers rely on the 3rd party library Popper.js for positioning. You must include popper.min.js before bootstrap.js or use bootstrap.bundle.min.js / bootstrap.bundle.js which contains Popper.js in order for popovers to work!

trans-unit.source: Prevent long strings of text from breaking your components' layout by using .text-break to set word-wrap: break-word and word-break: break-word. We use word-wrap instead of the more common overflow-wrap for wider browser support, and add the deprecated word-break: break-word to avoid issues with flex containers.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 .text-break 设置 word-wrap: break-word 和 word-break: break-word 防止长字符串破坏组件的布局。为了更广泛地支持浏览器，我们使用 word-wrap 而不是更常见的 overflow-wrap ，并添加了已弃用 word-break: break-word 以避免flex容器出现问题。

trans-unit.source: Provide an option to dismiss or close a component with .btn-close. Default styling is limited, but highly customizable. Modify the Sass variables to replace the default background-image. Be sure to include text for screen readers, as we’ve done with aria-label.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用 .btn-close 关闭或关闭组件的选项。默认样式是有限的，但是高度可定制的。修改Sass变量以替换默认的 background-image 。与 aria-label 一样，请确保为屏幕阅读器添加文字。

trans-unit.source: Provide contextual feedback messages for typical user actions with the handful of available and flexible alert messages.
trans-unit.target: 通过少量可用且灵活的提醒信息,为典型的用户操作提供上下文反馈信息。

trans-unit.source: Provide valuable, actionable feedback to your users with HTML5 form validation–available in all our supported browsers. Choose from the browser default validation feedback, or implement custom messages with our built-in classes and starter JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 通过我们所有受支持的浏览器中提供的 HTML5表单验证，为您的用户提供有价值的，可行的反馈。从浏览器的默认验证反馈中进行选择，或使用我们的内置类和入门JavaScript实施自定义消息。

trans-unit.source: Pull in Bootstrap’s source files into nearly any project with some of the most popular package managers. No matter the package manager, Bootstrap will require a Sass compiler and Autoprefixer for a setup that matches our official compiled versions.
trans-unit.target: 使用一些最受欢迎的软件包管理器，几乎可以将Bootstrap的源文件拖入任何项目中。无论软件包管理器是什么，Bootstrap都将需要Sass编译器和Autoprefixer来进行与我们官方编译版本匹配的设置。

trans-unit.source: Quick start
trans-unit.target: 快速启动

trans-unit.source: Quickly and easily clear floated content within a container by adding a clearfix utility.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加clearfix实用程序,可以快速、轻松地清除容器内的浮动内容。

trans-unit.source: Quickly and responsively toggle the display value of components and more with our display utilities. Includes support for some of the more common values, as well as some extras for controlling display when printing.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的显示实用程序,快速、灵敏地切换组件的显示值和更多。包括对一些更常见的值的支持,以及一些打印时控制显示的额外功能。

trans-unit.source: Quickly change the font-size of text. While our heading classes (e.g., .h1–.h6) apply font-size, font-weight, and line-height, these utilities only apply font-size. Sizing for these utilities matches HTML’s heading elements, so as the number increases, their size decreases.
trans-unit.target: 快速更改文本的 font-size 。虽然我们的标题类（例如 .h1 - .h6 ）应用 font-size ， font-weight 和 line-height ，但这些实用程序仅应用 font-size 。这些实用程序的大小与HTML的heading元素匹配，因此随着数量的增加，它们的大小会减小。

trans-unit.source: Quickly change the font-weight or font-style of text with these utilities. font-style utilities are abbreviated as .fst-* and font-weight utilities are abbreviated as .fw-*.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些实用程序快速更改文本的 font-weight 或 font-style 。 font-style 实用工具缩写为 .fst-* ， font-weight 实用工具缩写为 .fw-* 。

trans-unit.source: Quickly change the weight (boldness) of text or italicize text.
trans-unit.target: 快速改变文字的重量(粗体)或斜体文字。

trans-unit.source: Quickly manage the layout, alignment, and sizing of grid columns, navigation, components, and more with a full suite of responsive flexbox utilities. For more complex implementations, custom CSS may be necessary.
trans-unit.target: 使用全套的响应式 Flexbox 实用程序,快速管理网格列、导航、组件等的布局、对齐和大小。对于更复杂的实现,可能需要自定义CSS。

trans-unit.source: Range inputs have implicit values for min and max—0 and 100, respectively. You may specify new values for those using the min and max attributes.
trans-unit.target: 范围的输入的具有隐式值 min 和 max - 0 和 100 分别。您可以使用 min 和 max 属性为这些值指定新值。

trans-unit.source: Rather than using explicit .visible-* classes, you make an element visible by simply not hiding it at that screen size. You can combine one .d-*-none class with one .d-*-block class to show an element only on a given interval of screen sizes (e.g. .d-none.d-md-block.d-xl-none shows the element only on medium and large devices).
trans-unit.target: .visible-* 使用显式的.visible- *类，只需通过不以该屏幕大小隐藏元素就可以使其可见。您可以将一个 .d-*-none 类与一个 .d-*-block 类组合在一起，以仅在给定的屏幕尺寸间隔上显示元素（例如， .d-none.d-md-block.d-xl-none 仅在中型和大型设备上显示该元素）。

trans-unit.source: Reboot
trans-unit.target: Reboot

trans-unit.source: Reboot builds upon Normalize, providing many HTML elements with somewhat opinionated styles using only element selectors. Additional styling is done only with classes. For example, we reboot some <table> styles for a simpler baseline and later provide .table, .table-bordered, and more.
trans-unit.target: 重新启动建立在Normalize的基础上，仅使用元素选择器即可为许多HTML元素提供一些自以为是的样式。其他样式仅对类进行。例如，我们重新启动了一些 <table> 样式以简化基线，然后提供 .table ， .table-bordered 等。

trans-unit.source: Reboot includes an enhancement for role="button" to change the default cursor to pointer. Add this attribute to elements to help indicate elements are interactive. This role isn’t necessary for <button> elements, which get their own cursor change.
trans-unit.target: 重新引导包括对 role="button" 的增强，以将默认光标更改为 pointer 。将此属性添加到元素以帮助指示元素是交互式的。 <button> 元素不需要此角色，它们会自行更改 cursor 。

trans-unit.source: Reboot, a collection of element-specific CSS changes in a single file, kickstart Bootstrap to provide an elegant, consistent, and simple baseline to build upon.
trans-unit.target: Reboot,在一个文件中集合了特定元素的CSS变化,启动Bootstrap,以提供一个优雅的,一致的,简单的基线来建立。

trans-unit.target: 通过将组密钥设置为 null 来删除任何默认实用程序。例如，要删除我们所有的 width 实用程序，请创建 $utilities map-merge 并在其中添加 "width": null 。

trans-unit.target: 删除列表项的默认 list-style 和左边距（仅适用于立即子级）。这仅适用于直接子级列表项，这意味着您还需要为任何嵌套列表添加类。

trans-unit.target: 移除RTL中的工具

trans-unit.source: Removed $badge-color variable and its usage on .badge. We use a color contrast function to pick a color based on the background-color, so the variable is unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 删除了 $badge-color 变量及其在 .badge 上的用法。我们使用的色彩对比功能选择一个 color 基础上， background-color ，所以变量是不必要的。

trans-unit.source: Removed .btn-group-justified. As a replacement you can use <div class="btn-group d-flex" role="group"></div> as a wrapper around elements with .w-100.
trans-unit.target: 移除 .btn-group-justified 。作为替代，您可以使用 <div class="btn-group d-flex" role="group"></div> 作为 .w-100 元素的包装。

trans-unit.source: Removed .col-form-legend in favor of a slightly improved .col-form-label. This way .col-form-label-sm and .col-form-label-lg can be used on <legend> elements with ease.
trans-unit.target: 移除了 .col-form-legend ，而略微改进了 .col-form-label 。这样， .col-form-label-sm 和 .col-form-label-lg 可以轻松地用于 <legend> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Removed all responsive styling, deferring to utilities (e.g., showing captions on certain viewports) and custom styles as needed.
trans-unit.target: 去除了所有的响应式风格,根据需要交由实用程序(例如,在某些视口上显示标题)和自定义风格来处理。

trans-unit.source: Removed explicit spacing between button groups in button toolbars; use margin utilities now.
trans-unit.target: 删除了按钮工具栏中按钮组之间的明确间距;现在使用margin实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Removed from v3: .hidden-xs.hidden-sm.hidden-md.hidden-lg.visible-xs-block.visible-xs-inline.visible-xs-inline-block.visible-sm-block.visible-sm-inline.visible-sm-inline-block.visible-md-block.visible-md-inline.visible-md-inline-block.visible-lg-block.visible-lg-inline.visible-lg-inline-block
trans-unit.target: 从v3时被删除： .hidden-xs .hidden-sm .hidden-md .hidden-lg .visible-xs-block .visible-xs-inline .visible-xs-inline-block .visible-sm-block .visible-sm-inline .visible-sm-inline-block .visible-md-block .visible-md-inline .visible-md-inline-block .visible-lg-block .visible-lg-inline .visible-lg-inline-block

trans-unit.source: Removed from v4 alphas: .hidden-xs-up.hidden-xs-down.hidden-sm-up.hidden-sm-down.hidden-md-up.hidden-md-down.hidden-lg-up.hidden-lg-down
trans-unit.target: 从v4 Alpha中删除： .hidden-xs-up .hidden-xs-down .hidden-sm-up .hidden-sm-down .hidden-md-up .hidden-md-down .hidden-lg-down .hidden-lg-up .hidden- lg-down

trans-unit.source: Removed image overrides for images in carousel items, deferring to utilities.
trans-unit.target: 删除了旋转木马项目中的图片覆盖,交由实用程序处理。

trans-unit.source: Removed support for styled nested tables. All table styles are now inherited in v4 for simpler selectors.
trans-unit.target: 删除了对样式嵌套表的支持。所有表的样式现在都继承在v4中,以简化选择器。

trans-unit.source: Removed the following mixins: animation, animation-delay, animation-direction, animation-duration, animation-fill-mode, animation-iteration-count, animation-name, animation-timing-function, backface-visibility, box-sizing, content-columns, hyphens, opacity, perspective, perspective-origin, rotate, rotateX, rotateY, scale, scaleX, scaleY, skew, transform-origin, transition-delay, transition-duration, transition-property, transition-timing-function, transition-transform, translate, translate3d, user-select
trans-unit.target: 删除了以下混入： animation ， animation-delay ， animation-direction ， animation-duration ， animation-fill-mode ， animation-iteration-count ， animation-name ， animation-timing-function ， backface-visibility ， box-sizing ， content-columns ， hyphens ， opacity ， perspective ， perspective-origin ， rotate ， rotateX ， rotateY ， scale ， scaleX ， scaleY ， skew ， transform-origin ， transition-delay ， transition-duration ， transition-property ， transition-timing-function ， transition-transform ， translate ， translate3d ， user-select

trans-unit.source: Removed the unused $thumbnail-transition variable. We weren’t transitioning anything, so it was just extra code.
trans-unit.target: 删除了未使用的 $thumbnail-transition 变量。我们没有过渡任何东西，因此只是多余的代码。

trans-unit.source: Removed the unused .form-control-label class. If you did make use of this class, it was duplicate of the .col-form-label class that vertically centered a <label> with it’s associated input in horizontal form layouts.
trans-unit.target: 删除了未使用的 .form-control-label 类。如果您确实使用了此类，则它是 .col-form-label 类的副本，该类将 <label> 与其相关的输入垂直放置在水平表单布局中。

trans-unit.source: Removes the ability for an element’s popover to be shown. The popover will only be able to be shown if it is re-enabled.
trans-unit.target: 删除显示元素弹出框的功能。如果重新启用该弹出框，则只能显示该弹出框。

trans-unit.source: Removes the ability for an element’s tooltip to be shown. The tooltip will only be able to be shown if it is re-enabled.
trans-unit.target: 删除显示元素工具提示的功能。只有重新启用后，才能显示工具提示。

trans-unit.target: 将 .control-label 重命名为 .col-form-label 。

trans-unit.source: Renamed .table-condensed to .table-sm for consistency.
trans-unit.target: 为了一致性，将重命名为 .table-condensed 到 .table-sm 。

trans-unit.source: Renamed .table-inverse, .thead-inverse, and .thead-default to .*-dark and .*-light, matching our color schemes used elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 将 .table-inverse ， .thead-inverse 和 .thead-default 重命名为 .*-dark 和 .*-light ，以匹配我们在其他地方使用的配色方案。

trans-unit.source: Renamed grayscale() function to gray() to avoid breaking conflict with the CSS native grayscale filter.
trans-unit.target: 将 grayscale() 函数重命名为 gray() ,以避免破坏与CSS原生 grayscale 滤镜的冲突。

trans-unit.source: Renamed contextual classes to have a .table--prefix. Hence .active, .success, .warning, .danger and .info to .table-active, .table-success, .table-warning, .table-danger and .table-info.
trans-unit.target: 重命名上下文类以具有 .table- 前缀。因此， .active ， .success ， .warning ， .danger 和 .info 变为 .table-active ， .table-success ， .table-warning ， .table-danger 和 .table-info 。

trans-unit.source: Renamed the responsive grid modifier classes from .col-{breakpoint}-{modifier}-{size} to .{modifier}-{breakpoint}-{size} for simpler grid classes.
trans-unit.target: 将响应网格修改器类从 .col-{breakpoint}-{modifier}-{size} 重命名为 .{modifier}-{breakpoint}-{size} 以简化网格类。

trans-unit.target: 取代 .active 与动画进度条 .progress-bar-animated 。

trans-unit.target: 通过CSS的 :invalid 和 :valid 伪类，用HTML5表单验证替换了 .has-error ， .has-warning 和 .has-success 类。

trans-unit.target: 更换 a.list-group-item 有一个明确的类， .list-group-item-action ，设置样式列表组项目的链接和按钮的版本。

trans-unit.target: 用 .bg-* 实用程序替换了上下文的 .progress-bar-* 类。例如， class="progress-bar progress-bar-danger" 变为 class="progress-bar bg-danger" 。

trans-unit.source: Responsive containers
trans-unit.target: 响应式容器

trans-unit.source: Responsive containers allow you to specify a class that is 100% wide until the specified breakpoint is reached, after which we apply max-widths for each of the higher breakpoints. For example, .container-sm is 100% wide to start until the sm breakpoint is reached, where it will scale up with md, lg, xl, and xxl.
trans-unit.target: 响应式容器允许您指定100％宽的类，直到达到指定的断点为止，此后，我们对每个较高的断点应用 max-width 。例如， .container-sm 的宽度为100％，直到到达 sm 断点为止，该断点将按 md ， lg ， xl 和 xxl 进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: Responsive containers are new in Bootstrap v4.4. They allow you to specify a class that is 100% wide until the specified breakpoint is reached, after which we apply max-widths for each of the higher breakpoints. For example, .container-sm is 100% wide to start until the sm breakpoint is reached, where it will scale up with md, lg, and xl.
trans-unit.target: 响应容器是Bootstrap v4.4中的新增功能。它们允许您指定100％宽的类，直到达到指定的断点为止，此后，我们对每个较高的断点应用 max-width 。例如， .container-sm 的宽度为100％，直到达到 sm 断点为止，该断点将按 md ， lg 和 xl 进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: Responsive navbar behaviors are now applied to the .navbar class via the required.navbar-expand-{breakpoint} where you choose where to collapse the navbar. Previously this was a Less variable modification and required recompiling.
trans-unit.target: 响应式导航栏行为现在通过所需的 .navbar-expand-{breakpoint} 应用于 .navbar 类，您可以在其中选择折叠导航栏的位置。以前，这是较少变量的修改，需要重新编译。

trans-unit.source: Responsive sticky top
trans-unit.target: 响应式粘顶

trans-unit.source: Responsive tables
trans-unit.target: 响应式表格

trans-unit.source: Responsive tables allow tables to be scrolled horizontally with ease. Make any table responsive across all viewports by wrapping a .table with .table-responsive. Or, pick a maximum breakpoint with which to have a responsive table up to by using .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl|-xxl}.
trans-unit.target: 响应式表允许轻松地水平滚动表。通过使用 .table-responsive .table 包装.table，使所有表在所有视口中都具有响应能力。或者，通过使用 .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl|-xxl} 来选择具有响应表的最大断点。

trans-unit.source: Responsive tables allow tables to be scrolled horizontally with ease. Make any table responsive across all viewports by wrapping a .table with .table-responsive. Or, pick a maximum breakpoint with which to have a responsive table up to by using .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl}.
trans-unit.target: 响应式表允许轻松地水平滚动表。通过使用 .table-responsive .table 包装.table，使所有表在所有视口中具有响应能力。或者，通过使用 .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl} 来选择具有响应表的最大断点。

trans-unit.source: Responsive tables make use of overflow-y: hidden, which clips off any content that goes beyond the bottom or top edges of the table. In particular, this can clip off dropdown menus and other third-party widgets.
trans-unit.target: 响应表使用了 overflow-y: hidden ，它会剪裁超出表底部或顶部边缘的所有内容。特别是，这可以剪切下拉菜单和其他第三方小部件。

trans-unit.source: Responsive tables now generate classes for each grid breakpoint. This breaks from Beta 1 in that the .table-responsive you’ve been using is more like .table-responsive-md. You may now use .table-responsive or .table-responsive-{sm,md,lg,xl} as needed.
trans-unit.target: 响应表现在为每个网格断点生成类。从Beta 1中的这打破 .table-responsive 你已经使用更像 .table-responsive-md 。现在，您可以根据需要使用 .table-responsive 或 .table-responsive-{sm,md,lg,xl} 。

trans-unit.source: Revamped grid tiers to add a fifth option (addressing smaller devices at 576px and below) and removed the -xs infix from those classes. Example: .col-6.col-sm-4.col-md-3.
trans-unit.target: 改进了网格层以添加第五个选项（寻址 576px 及以下的较小设备），并从这些类中删除了 -xs 前缀。例如： .col-6.col-sm-4.col-md-3 。

trans-unit.source: Reveals an element’s popover. Returns to the caller before the popover has actually been shown (i.e. before the shown.bs.popover event occurs). This is considered a “manual” triggering of the popover. Popovers whose title and content are both zero-length are never displayed.
trans-unit.target: 显示元素的弹出框。在实际显示弹出窗口之前（即在 shown.bs.popover 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。这被认为是弹出窗口的“手动”触发。标题和内容均为零长度的弹出窗口永远不会显示。

trans-unit.source: Reveals an element’s toast. Returns to the caller before the toast has actually been shown (i.e. before the shown.bs.toast event occurs). You have to manually call this method, instead your toast won’t show.
trans-unit.target: 展现元素的敬酒。在实际显示敬酒之前（即在 shown.bs.toast 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。您必须手动调用此方法，否则不会显示吐司。

trans-unit.source: Reveals an element’s tooltip. Returns to the caller before the tooltip has actually been shown (i.e. before the shown.bs.tooltip event occurs). This is considered a “manual” triggering of the tooltip. Tooltips with zero-length titles are never displayed.
trans-unit.target: 显示元素的工具提示。在实际显示工具提示之前（即在 shown.bs.tooltip 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。这被认为是工具提示的“手动”触发。标题长度为零的工具提示永远不会显示。

trans-unit.source: Rewrote both custom and default checkboxes and radios. Now, both have matching HTML structure (outer <div> with sibling <input> and <label>) and the same layout styles (stacked default, inline with modifier class). This allows us to style the label based on the input’s state, simplifying support for the disabled attribute (previously requiring a parent class) and better supporting our form validation.
trans-unit.target: 重写了自定义复选框和默认复选框以及单选框。现在，两者都具有匹配的HTML结构（具有同级 <input> 和 <label> 的外部 <div> ）和相同的布局样式（堆叠的默认值，内联修饰符类）。这使我们可以根据输入的状态来设置标签样式，简化对 disabled 属性的支持（以前需要父类），并更好地支持我们的表单验证。

trans-unit.source: Rewrote component with flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 用flexbox重写组件。

trans-unit.source: Row columns gutters
trans-unit.target: 排柱式水槽

trans-unit.source: Rows are wrappers for columns. Each column has horizontal padding (called a gutter) for controlling the space between them. This padding is then counteracted on the rows with negative margins. This way, all the content in your columns is visually aligned down the left side.
trans-unit.target: 行是列的包装。每列都有水平 padding （称为装订线），用于控制它们之间的间距。然后在具有负边距的行上抵消此 padding 。这样，列中的所有内容在视觉上都在左侧向下对齐。

trans-unit.source: Selects the given list item and shows its associated pane. Any other list item that was previously selected becomes unselected and its associated pane is hidden. Returns to the caller before the tab pane has actually been shown (for example, before the shown.bs.tab event occurs).

trans-unit.source: Selects the given tab and shows its associated pane. Any other tab that was previously selected becomes unselected and its associated pane is hidden. Returns to the caller before the tab pane has actually been shown (i.e. before the shown.bs.tab event occurs).

trans-unit.source: Set the visibility of elements with our visibility utilities. These utility classes do not modify the display value at all and do not affect layout – .invisible elements still take up space in the page.
trans-unit.target: 设置 visibility 与我们的知名度公用事业元素。这些实用程序类根本不会修改 display 值，也不会影响布局–不 .invisible 元素仍会占据页面中的空间。

trans-unit.source: Set the visibility of elements with our visibility utilities. These utility classes do not modify the display value at all and do not affect layout – .invisible elements still take up space in the page. Content will be hidden both visually and for assistive technology/screen reader users.
trans-unit.target: 使用 visibility 性实用程序设置元素的可见性。这些实用程序类根本不会修改 display 值，也不会影响布局–不 .invisible 元素仍会占用页面空间。内容将在视觉上和辅助技术/屏幕阅读器用户中隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Set the direction of flex items in a flex container with direction utilities. In most cases you can omit the horizontal class here as the browser default is row. However, you may encounter situations where you needed to explicitly set this value (like responsive layouts).
trans-unit.target: 使用方向实用程序在flex容器中设置flex项目的方向。在大多数情况下，您可以在此处省略水平类，因为浏览器的默认值为 row 。但是，您可能会遇到需要显式设置此值的情况（例如响应式布局）。

trans-unit.source: Set the global link color via $link-color and apply link underlines only on :hover.
trans-unit.target: 通过 $link-color 设置全局链接颜色，并仅在 :hover 上应用链接下划线。

trans-unit.source: Set the global link color via $link-color.
trans-unit.target: 通过 $link-color 设置全局链接颜色。

trans-unit.source: Set to true to show warnings when using any of the deprecated mixins and functions that are planned to be removed in v5.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 可以在使用计划在 v5 中删除的任何不推荐使用的mixin和函数时显示警告。

trans-unit.source: Setting one column width
trans-unit.target: 设置一列宽度

trans-unit.source: Several Bootstrap components utilize z-index, the CSS property that helps control layout by providing a third axis to arrange content. We utilize a default z-index scale in Bootstrap that’s been designed to properly layer navigation, tooltips and popovers, modals, and more.
trans-unit.target: 几个Bootstrap组件利用 z-index 这个CSS属性，它通过提供第三个轴来安排内容来帮助控制布局。我们在Bootstrap中使用默认的z-index比例尺，该比例尺旨在适当地分层导航，工具提示和弹出窗口，模态等。

trans-unit.source: Should you encounter problems with installing dependencies, uninstall all previous dependency versions (global and local). Then, rerun npm install.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在安装依赖项时遇到问题，请卸载所有以前的依赖项版本（全局和本地）。然后，重新运行 npm install 。

trans-unit.source: Should you need to add display: flex to an element, do so with .d-flex or one of the responsive variants (e.g., .d-sm-flex). You’ll need this class or display value to allow the use of our extra flexbox utilities for sizing, alignment, spacing, and more.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要在元素上添加 display: flex ，请使用 .d-flex 或响应性变体之一（例如 .d-sm-flex ）进行添加。您将需要此类或 display 值，以允许使用我们额外的flexbox实用程序来调整大小，对齐，间隔等。

trans-unit.source: Should you need to modify your $grid-breakpoints, your changes will apply to all the loops iterating over that map.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要修改 $grid-breakpoints ，则所做的更改将应用​​于对该地图进行迭代的所有循环。

trans-unit.source: Should you require build tools, they are included for developing Bootstrap and its docs, but they’re likely unsuitable for your own purposes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要构建工具，则可以使用它们来开发Bootstrap及其文档，但它们可能不适合您自己的目的。

trans-unit.target: 与页眉和页脚相似，卡片可以包括顶部和底部的“图像上限”，即图像顶部或底部的图像。

trans-unit.source: Similar to tables and dark tables, use the modifier classes .table-light or .table-dark to make <thead>s appear light or dark gray.
trans-unit.target: 与表和黑表类似，使用修饰符类 .table-light 或 .table-dark 使 <thead> 呈现为浅灰色或深灰色。

trans-unit.source: Similar to tables and dark tables, use the modifier classes .thead-light or .thead-dark to make <thead>s appear light or dark gray.

trans-unit.source: Similar to the .nav-fill example using a <nav>-based navigation, be sure to include .nav-item on the anchors.
trans-unit.target: 与使用基于 <nav> 的导航的 .nav-fill 示例类似，请确保在锚点上包含 .nav-item 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the .nav-fill example using a <nav>-based navigation.
trans-unit.target: 类似于使用基于 <nav> 的导航的 .nav-fill 示例。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the contextual text color classes, easily set the background of an element to any contextual class. Anchor components will darken on hover, just like the text classes. Background utilities do not set color, so in some cases you’ll want to use .text-* utilities.
trans-unit.target: 与上下文文本颜色类相似，可以轻松地将元素的背景设置为任何上下文类。锚点组件会像文本类一样在悬停时变暗。背景实用程序不会设置 color ，因此在某些情况下，您将需要使用 .text-* 实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the contextual text color classes, easily set the background of an element to any contextual class. Background utilities do not set color, so in some cases you’ll want to use .text-* utilities.
trans-unit.target: 与上下文文本颜色类相似，可以轻松地将元素的背景设置为任何上下文类。背景实用程序不会设置 color ，因此在某些情况下，您将需要使用 .text-* 实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, create split button dropdowns with virtually the same markup as single button dropdowns, but with the addition of .dropdown-toggle-split for proper spacing around the dropdown caret.
trans-unit.target: 同样，创建拆分按钮下拉菜单时，其标记实际上与单按钮下拉菜单相同，但是要添加 .dropdown-toggle-split 以便在下拉式插入符周围保持适当的间距。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, media queries may span multiple breakpoint widths:
trans-unit.target: 同样,媒体查询可能跨越多个断点宽度。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the latest versions of most desktop browsers are supported.
trans-unit.target: 同样,也支持大多数桌面浏览器的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, we have options for including some or all of our compiled JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 同样,我们也可以选择包含部分或全部编译后的JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: Simplified dropdown styles to no longer ship with upward or downward facing arrows attached to the dropdown menu.
trans-unit.target: 简化了下拉样式,不再在下拉菜单上附加向上或向下的箭头。

trans-unit.source: Since Bootstrap applies display: block and width: 100% to almost all our form controls, forms will by default stack vertically. Additional classes can be used to vary this layout on a per-form basis.
trans-unit.target: 由于Bootstrap将 display: block 和 width: 100% 应用于几乎所有表单控件，因此默认情况下，表单将垂直堆叠。可以使用其他类来根据表单更改此布局。

trans-unit.source: Since Bootstrap is developed to be mobile first, we use a handful of media queries to create sensible breakpoints for our layouts and interfaces. These breakpoints are mostly based on minimum viewport widths and allow us to scale up elements as the viewport changes.
trans-unit.target: 由于Bootstrap首先开发为移动设备，因此我们使用了少数媒体查询来为布局和界面创建合理的断点。这些断点主要基于最小视口宽度，并允许我们随着视口的变化按比例放大元素。

trans-unit.source: Since breadcrumbs provide a navigation, it’s a good idea to add a meaningful label such as aria-label="breadcrumb" to describe the type of navigation provided in the <nav> element, as well as applying an aria-current="page" to the last item of the set to indicate that it represents the current page.
trans-unit.target: 由于面包屑提供了导航，因此最好添加一个有意义的标签，例如 aria-label="breadcrumb" 来描述 <nav> 元素中提供的导航类型，以及应用 aria-current="page" 到集合的最后一项，以表示它代表当前页面。

trans-unit.source: Since we write our source CSS in Sass, all our media queries are available via Sass mixins:
trans-unit.target: 由于我们用Sass编写源CSS,所以我们所有的媒体查询都可以通过Sass mixins来实现。

trans-unit.source: Some combinations of colors that currently make up Bootstrap’s default palette—used throughout the framework for things such as button variations, alert variations, form validation indicators—may lead to insufficient color contrast (below the recommended WCAG 2.1 text color contrast ratio of 4.5:1 and the WCAG 2.1 non-text color contrast ratio of 3:1), particularly when used against a light background. Authors are encouraged to test their specific uses of color and, where necessary, manually modify/extend these default colors to ensure adequate color contrast ratios.
trans-unit.target: 当前构成Bootstrap默认调色板的某些颜色组合（在整个框架中用于按钮变化，警报变化，表单验证指示符之类的东西）可能会导致颜色对比度不足（低于建议的WCAG 2.1文本颜色对比度4.5：1）以及WCAG 2.1非文本颜色对比度为3：1），尤其是在浅色背景上使用时。鼓励作者测试其特定的颜色用途，并在必要时手动修改/扩展这些默认颜色，以确保有足够的颜色对比度。

trans-unit.source: Some edge cases make RTL styling difficult, such as line breaks in Arabic. Thus utilities can be dropped from RTL output by setting the rtl option to false:
trans-unit.target: 一些边缘情况使RTL样式设置很困难，例如阿拉伯语的换行符。因此，可以通过将 rtl 选项设置为 false 来从RTL输出中删除实用程序：

trans-unit.source: Some future-friendly styles are included to disable all pointer-events on anchor buttons.
trans-unit.target: 包括一些将来友好的样式，以禁用锚点按钮上的所有 pointer-events 。

trans-unit.source: Some future-friendly styles are included to disable all pointer-events on anchor buttons. In browsers which support that property, you won’t see the disabled cursor at all.
trans-unit.target: 包括一些将来友好的样式，以禁用锚点按钮上的所有 pointer-events 。在支持该属性的浏览器中，您根本看不到禁用的光标。

trans-unit.source: Some of our Sass maps are merged into empty ones by default. This is done to allow easy expansion of a given Sass map, but comes at the cost of making removing items from a map slightly more difficult.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，我们的一些Sass映射会合并为空映射。这样做是为了轻松扩展给定的Sass地图，但是这样做的代价是使从地图中删除项目变得更加困难。

trans-unit.source: Some of the button styles use a relatively light foreground color, and should only be used on a dark background in order to have sufficient contrast.
trans-unit.target: 有些按钮样式使用了比较浅的前景色,为了有足够的对比度,只能在深色背景上使用。

trans-unit.source: Some of the link styles use a relatively light foreground color, and should only be used on a dark background in order to have sufficient contrast.
trans-unit.target: 有些链接样式使用了比较浅的前景色,为了有足够的对比度,只能在深色背景上使用。

trans-unit.source: Some plugins and CSS components depend on other plugins. If you include plugins individually, make sure to check for these dependencies in the docs.
trans-unit.target: 有些插件和CSS组件依赖于其他插件。如果你单独包含插件,请务必在文档中检查这些依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Some plugins and CSS components depend on other plugins. If you include plugins individually, make sure to check for these dependencies in the docs. Also note that all plugins depend on jQuery (this means jQuery must be included before the plugin files). Consult our package.json to see which versions of jQuery are supported.
trans-unit.target: 一些插件和CSS组件依赖于其他插件。如果您单独包含插件，请确保在文档中检查这些依赖项。还要注意，所有插件都依赖jQuery（这意味着必须在插件文件之前包含jQuery ）。请查阅我们的 package.json 以查看支持哪些版本的jQuery。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes contextual classes cannot be applied due to the specificity of another selector. In some cases, a sufficient workaround is to wrap your element’s content in a <div> with the class.
trans-unit.target: 有时由于另一个选择器的特殊性，无法应用上下文类。在某些情况下，一种充分的解决方法是将元素的内容与类一起包装在 <div> 中。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is necessary to use Bootstrap plugins with other UI frameworks. In these circumstances, namespace collisions can occasionally occur. If this happens, you may call .noConflict on the plugin you wish to revert the value of.
trans-unit.target: 有时，必须将Bootstrap插件与其他UI框架一起使用。在这些情况下，名称空间冲突有时会发生。如果发生这种情况，可以在要还原其值的插件上调用 .noConflict 。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want to use the collapse plugin to trigger a container element for content that structurally sits outside of the .navbar . Because our plugin works on the id and data-bs-target matching, that’s easily done!
trans-unit.target: 有时，您想使用折叠插件来触发结构上位于 .navbar 之外的内容的容器元素。因为我们的插件可以在 id 和 data-bs-target 匹配上工作，所以很容易做到！

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want to use the collapse plugin to trigger hidden content elsewhere on the page. Because our plugin works on the id and data-target matching, that’s easily done!
trans-unit.target: 有时，您想使用折叠插件来触发页面其他位置的隐藏内容。因为我们的插件可以处理 id 和 data-target 匹配，所以很容易做到！

trans-unit.source: Spacing
trans-unit.target: Spacing

trans-unit.source: Spacing utilities that apply to all breakpoints, from xs to xl, have no breakpoint abbreviation in them. This is because those classes are applied from min-width: 0 and up, and thus are not bound by a media query. The remaining breakpoints, however, do include a breakpoint abbreviation.
trans-unit.target: 适用于从 xs 到 xl 的所有断点的间距实用程序中没有断点缩写。这是因为这些类从 min-width: 0 开始使用，因此不受媒体查询的约束。但是，其余的断点确实包含断点的缩写。

trans-unit.source: Spacing utilities that apply to all breakpoints, from xs to xxl, have no breakpoint abbreviation in them. This is because those classes are applied from min-width: 0 and up, and thus are not bound by a media query. The remaining breakpoints, however, do include a breakpoint abbreviation.
trans-unit.target: 适用于从 xs 到 xxl 的所有断点的间距实用程序中没有断点缩写。这是因为这些类从 min-width: 0 开始使用，因此不受媒体查询的约束。但是，其余的断点确实包含断点的缩写。

trans-unit.source: Support for overflow: hidden; on the <body> element is quite limited in iOS and Android. trans-unit.source: Thanks to flexbox, grid columns without a specified width will automatically layout as equal width columns. For example, four instances of .col-sm will each automatically be 25% wide from the small breakpoint and up. See the auto-layout columns section for more examples.

trans-unit.source: The stateful button feature of the button.js jQuery plugin has been dropped. This includes the $().button(string) and $().button('reset') methods. We advise using a tiny bit of custom JavaScript instead, which will have the benefit of behaving exactly the way you want it to.
trans-unit.target: jQuery插件 button.js 的状态按钮功能已被删除。这包括 $().button(string) 和 $().button('reset') 方法。我们建议改用少量的自定义JavaScript，这将具有完全按照您希望的方式运行的好处。

trans-unit.source: The breadcrumb separator is the only case requiring its own brand new variable— namely $breadcrumb-divider-flipped —defaulting to $breadcrumb-divider.

trans-unit.source: The $modal-fade-transform variable determines the transform state of .modal-dialog before the modal fade-in animation, the $modal-show-transform variable determines the transform of .modal-dialog at the end of the modal fade-in animation.
trans-unit.target: 的 $modal-fade-transform 变量确定变换的状态 .modal-dialog 的模态淡入动画时，前 $modal-show-transform 变量确定变换的 .modal-dialog 在模态淡入的结束动画。

trans-unit.source: The $utilities map contains all our utilities and is later merged with your custom $utilities map, if present. The utility map contains a keyed list of utility groups which accept the following options:
trans-unit.target: 在 $utilities 地图包含了所有我们的事业，并随后与您的自定义合并 $utilities 地图，如果存在的话。实用程序映射包含一个公用程序组的键控列表，这些列表接受以下选项：

trans-unit.source: The <abbr> element receives basic styling to make it stand out amongst paragraph text.
trans-unit.target: 该 <abbr> 元素接收基本样式，以使它脱颖而出之间段落文本。

trans-unit.source: The <address> element is updated to reset the browser default font-style from italic to normal. line-height is also now inherited, and margin-bottom: 1rem has been added. <address>s are for presenting contact information for the nearest ancestor (or an entire body of work). Preserve formatting by ending lines with <br>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <address> 元素被更新为浏览器的默认复位 font-style 从 italic 到 normal 。现在还继承了 line-height ，并且 margin-bottom: 1rem 添加了1rem。 <address> 用于显示最接近的祖先（或整个作品）的联系信息。通过以 <br> 结尾的行来保留格式。

trans-unit.source: The <body> also sets a global font-family, font-weight, line-height, and color. This is inherited later by some form elements to prevent font inconsistencies.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <body> 还设置全局 font-family ， font-weight ， line-height ，和 color 。稍后，某些表单元素会继承此格式，以防止字体不一致。

trans-unit.source: The <body> also sets a global font-family, line-height, and text-align. This is inherited later by some form elements to prevent font inconsistencies.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <body> 还设置全局 font-family ， line-height ，和 text-align 。稍后，某些表单元素会继承此格式，以防止字体不一致。

trans-unit.source: The <html> and <body> elements are updated to provide better page-wide defaults. More specifically:
trans-unit.target: 的 <html> 和 <body> 元素被更新，以提供更好的页宽的默认值。进一步来说：

trans-unit.source: The <pre> element is reset to remove its margin-top and use rem units for its margin-bottom.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <pre> 元件被复位以除去其 margin-top 和使用 rem 单位其 margin-bottom 。

trans-unit.source: The .btn classes are designed to be used with the <button> element. However, you can also use these classes on <a> or <input> elements (though some browsers may apply a slightly different rendering).
trans-unit.target: 的 .btn 类被设计成与被使用 <button> 元素。但是，您也可以在 <a> 或 <input> 元素上使用这些类（尽管某些浏览器可能会使用略有不同的呈现方式）。

trans-unit.source: The .col-* classes can also be used outside a .row to give an element a specific width. Whenever column classes are used as non direct children of a row, the paddings are omitted.
trans-unit.target: 所述 .col-* 类也可以一个外部使用 .row ，得到的元件的特定宽度。每当将列类用作行的非直接子代时，都将省略填充。

trans-unit.source: The .disabled class uses pointer-events: none to try to disable the link functionality of <a>s, but that CSS property is not yet standardized. In addition, even in browsers that do support pointer-events: none, keyboard navigation remains unaffected, meaning that sighted keyboard users and users of assistive technologies will still be able to activate these links. So to be safe, add a tabindex="-1" attribute on these links (to prevent them from receiving keyboard focus) and use custom JavaScript to disable their functionality.
trans-unit.target: 该 .disabled 类使用 pointer-events: none 尝试禁用的链路功能 <a> S，但CSS属性尚不规范。另外，即使在支持 pointer-events: none 浏览器中：none，键盘导航也不受影响，这意味着有经验的键盘用户和辅助技术用户仍将能够激活这些链接。为安全起见，请在这些链接上添加 tabindex="-1" 属性（以防止它们获得键盘焦点），并使用自定义JavaScript禁用其功能。

trans-unit.source: The .disabled class uses pointer-events: none to try to disable the link functionality of <a>s, but that CSS property is not yet standardized. In addition, even in browsers that do support pointer-events: none, keyboard navigation remains unaffected, meaning that sighted keyboard users and users of assistive technologies will still be able to activate these links. So to be safe, in addition to aria-disabled="true", also include a tabindex="-1" attribute on these links to prevent them from receiving keyboard focus, and use custom JavaScript to disable their functionality altogether.
trans-unit.target: 该 .disabled 类使用 pointer-events: none 尝试禁用的链路功能 <a> S，但CSS属性尚不规范。此外，即使在支持 pointer-events: none 浏览器中：none，键盘导航也不会受到影响，这意味着有经验的键盘用户和辅助技术用户仍将能够激活这些链接。因此，为了安全起见，除了 aria-disabled="true" ，还应在这些链接上包含 tabindex="-1" 属性，以防止它们接收键盘焦点，并使用自定义JavaScript完全禁用其功能。

trans-unit.source: The .dropdown-backdrop element isn’t used on iOS in the nav because of the complexity of z-indexing. Thus, to close dropdowns in navbars, you must directly click the dropdown element (or any other element which will fire a click event in iOS).
trans-unit.target: 所述 .dropdown-backdrop 元件未在NAV使用在iOS因为的z索引的复杂性。因此，要关闭导航栏中的下拉菜单，必须直接单击dropdown元素（或将触发iOS中的click事件的任何其他元素）。

trans-unit.source: The .form-group class is the easiest way to add some structure to forms. It provides a flexible class that encourages proper grouping of labels, controls, optional help text, and form validation messaging. By default it only applies margin-bottom, but it picks up additional styles in .form-inline as needed. Use it with <fieldset>s, <div>s, or nearly any other element.
trans-unit.target: 该 .form-group 类是一些结构添加到形式最简单的方法。它提供了一个灵活的类，它鼓励标签，控件，可选的帮助文本和表单验证消息的正确分组。默认情况下，它仅适用于 margin-bottom ，但是根据需要在 .form-inline 中采用其他样式。与 <fieldset> ， <div> 或几乎任何其他元素一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The .hidden and .show classes have been removed because they conflicted with jQuery’s $(...).hide() and $(...).show() methods. Instead, try toggling the [hidden] attribute or use inline styles like style="display: none;" and style="display: block;".
trans-unit.target: 该 .hidden 和 .show 类已删除，因为它们与jQuery的抵触 $(...).hide() 和 $(...).show() 方法。而是尝试切换 [hidden] 属性或使用内嵌样式，例如 style="display: none;" 和 style="display: block;" 。

trans-unit.source: The .navbar-brand can be applied to most elements, but an anchor works best as some elements might require utility classes or custom styles.
trans-unit.target: 该 .navbar-brand 可以适用于大多数元素，但锚效果最好的一些元素可能需要的工具类或自定义样式。

trans-unit.source: The .navbar-brand can be applied to most elements, but an anchor works best, as some elements might require utility classes or custom styles.
trans-unit.target: 该 .navbar-brand 可以适用于大多数元素，但锚效果最好，因为有些材料可能需要的工具类或自定义样式。

trans-unit.source: The .pe-none class (and the pointer-events CSS property it sets) only prevents interactions with a pointer (mouse, stylus, touch). Links and controls with .pe-none are, by default, still focusable and actionable for keyboard users. To ensure that they are completely neutralized even for keyboard users, you may need to add further attributes such as tabindex="-1" (to prevent them from receiving keyboard focus) and aria-disabled="true" (to convey the fact they are effectively disabled to assistive technologies), and possibly use JavaScript to completely prevent them from being actionable. For form controls, consider using the disabled HTML attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 所述 .pe-none 类（和 pointer-events 它设置CSS属性）仅阻止相互作用用指针（鼠标，指示笔，触摸）。默认情况下，带有 .pe-none 的链接和控件对于键盘用户仍然可以集中并且可操作。为了确保即使对于键盘用户，它们也被完全中和，您可能需要添加其他属性，例如 tabindex="-1" （以防止他们获得键盘焦点）和 aria-disabled="true" （以传达它们的事实）。被有效地禁用了辅助技术），并可能使用JavaScript完全阻止了它们的可操作性。对于表单控件，请考虑改用 disabled HTML属性。

trans-unit.source: The collapse JavaScript plugin is used to show and hide content. Buttons or anchors are used as triggers that are mapped to specific elements you toggle. trans-unit.source: Then we add a gradient on the table cells with background-image: linear-gradient(var(--bs-table-accent-bg), var(--bs-table-accent-bg)); to layer on top of any specified background-color. Since --bs-table-accent-bg is transparent by default, we have an invisible transparent linear gradient by default.
trans-unit.target: 然后我们在带有 background-image: linear-gradient(var(--bs-table-accent-bg), var(--bs-table-accent-bg)); 的表格单元格上添加一个渐变：linear-gradient（var（-bs-table-accent-bg），var（-bs-table-accent-bg））; 可以在任何指定的 background-color 之上分层。由于 --bs-table-accent-bg 默认情况下是透明的，因此默认情况下我们有一个不可见的透明线性渐变。

These use the same viewport breakpoints as our grid system. Please be aware float utilities have no effect on flex items.
trans-unit.target: 这些实用程序类使用CSS float 属性根据当前视口的大小向左或向右浮动元素，或禁用浮动。包括 !important 以避免特异性问题。它们使用与我们的网格系统相同的视口断点。请注意，浮动实用程序对弹性项目没有影响。

trans-unit.source: These validation warnings don’t matter in practice since the non-hacky portion of our CSS does fully validate and the hacky portions don’t interfere with the proper functioning of the non-hacky portion, hence why we deliberately ignore these particular warnings.

trans-unit.source: This is the most basic form of Bootstrap: precompiled files for quick drop-in usage in nearly any web project. We provide compiled CSS and JS (bootstrap.*), as well as compiled and minified CSS and JS (bootstrap.min.*). source maps (bootstrap.*.map) are available for use with certain browsers’ developer tools. Bundled JS files (bootstrap.bundle.js and minified bootstrap.bundle.min.js) include Popper, but not jQuery.
trans-unit.target: 这是Bootstrap的最基本形式：预编译的文件，几乎可以在任何Web项目中快速使用。我们提供已编译的CSS和JS（ bootstrap.* ），以及已编译和缩小的CSS和JS（ bootstrap.min.* ）。源映射（ bootstrap.*.map ）可用于某些浏览器的开发人员工具。捆绑的JS文件（ bootstrap.bundle.js 和缩小的 bootstrap.bundle.min.js ）包含Popper，但不包括jQuery。

trans-unit.source: This is the most basic form of Bootstrap: precompiled files for quick drop-in usage in nearly any web project. We provide compiled CSS and JS (bootstrap.*), as well as compiled and minified CSS and JS (bootstrap.min.*). source maps (bootstrap.*.map) are available for use with certain browsers' developer tools. Bundled JS files (bootstrap.bundle.js and minified bootstrap.bundle.min.js) include Popper.
trans-unit.target: 这是Bootstrap的最基本形式：预编译的文件，几乎可以在任何Web项目中快速使用。我们提供已编译的CSS和JS（ bootstrap.* ），以及已编译和缩小的CSS和JS（ bootstrap.min.* ）。源映射（ bootstrap.*.map ）可用于某些浏览器的开发人员工具。捆绑的JS文件（ bootstrap.bundle.js 和缩小的 bootstrap.bundle.min.js ）包括Popper。

trans-unit.source: Throughout our v4 alpha and beta releases, we included incomplete and commented out code for opting into a media query shim that would disable hover styles in touch device browsers that emulate hovering. This work was never fully completed or enabled, but to avoid complete breakage, we’ve opted to deprecate this shim and keep the mixins as shortcuts for the pseudo-classes.
trans-unit.target: 在整个v4 alpha和beta版本中，我们包含了不完整且已注释掉的代码，用于加入媒体查询填充程序，该填充程序将在模拟悬停的触摸设备浏览器中禁用悬停样式。这项工作从未完全完成或启用，但是为了避免完全损坏，我们选择弃用此填充程序，并将mixins保留为伪类的快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: Titles, text, and links

trans-unit.source: To allow keyboard users to activate your popovers, you should only add them to HTML elements that are traditionally keyboard-focusable and interactive (such as links or form controls). Although arbitrary HTML elements (such as <span>s) can be made focusable by adding the tabindex="0" attribute, this will add potentially annoying and confusing tab stops on non-interactive elements for keyboard users, and most assistive technologies currently do not announce the popover’s content in this situation. Additionally, do not rely solely on hover as the trigger for your popovers, as this will make them impossible to trigger for keyboard users.
trans-unit.target: 要允许键盘用户激活您的弹出框，您应该只将其添加到传统上可键盘聚焦和交互的HTML元素中（例如链接或表单控件）。尽管可以通过添加 tabindex="0" 属性使任意HTML元素（例如 <span> ）成为可聚焦的，但这将为键盘用户在非交互式元素上添加潜在的令人讨厌和令人困惑的制表位，并且大多数辅助技术目前都在使用在这种情况下不宣布弹出窗口的内容。此外，不要仅将 hover 作为弹出窗口的触发器，因为这将使它们无法为键盘用户触发。

trans-unit.source: To animate alerts when dismissing them, be sure to add the .fade and .show classes.
trans-unit.target: 要在关闭警报时为其制作动画，请确保添加 .fade 和 .show 类。

trans-unit.source: To convey the active state to assistive technologies, use the aria-current attribute — using the page value for current page, or true for the current item in a set.

trans-unit.source: To easily add scrollspy behavior to your topbar navigation, add data-bs-spy="scroll" to the element you want to spy on (most typically this would be the <body>). Then add the data-bs-target attribute with the ID or class of the parent element of any Bootstrap .nav component.
trans-unit.target: 为了轻松地将滚动显示行为添加到顶部导航中，请将 data-bs-spy="scroll" 到您要监视的元素上（最常见的是 <body> ）。然后，将 data-bs-target 属性与任何Bootstrap .nav 组件的父元素的ID或类一起添加。

trans-unit.source: To easily add scrollspy behavior to your topbar navigation, add data-spy="scroll" to the element you want to spy on (most typically this would be the <body>). Then add the data-target attribute with the ID or class of the parent element of any Bootstrap .nav component.
trans-unit.target: 为了轻松地将滚动显示行为添加到顶部导航中，请将 data-spy="scroll" 到您要监视的元素上（最常见的是 <body> ）。然后，将 data-target 属性与任何Bootstrap .nav 组件的父元素的ID或类一起添加。

trans-unit.source: To encourage extensible and predictable toasts, we recommend a header and body. Toast headers use display: flex, allowing easy alignment of content thanks to our margin and flexbox utilities.

trans-unit.source: To enjoy the full potential of Bootstrap and customize it to your needs, use the source files as a part of your project’s bundling process.
trans-unit.target: 要充分发挥Bootstrap的潜能并根据需要对其进行自定义，请将源文件用作项目捆绑过程的一部分。

trans-unit.source: To handle overlapping borders within components (e.g., buttons and inputs in input groups), we use low single digit z-index values of 1, 2, and 3 for default, hover, and active states. On hover/focus/active, we bring a particular element to the forefront with a higher z-index value to show their border over the sibling elements.
trans-unit.target: 为了处理重叠的组件（例如，按钮和输入组的输入）内的边界中，我们使用低单位 z-index 值的 1 ， 2 ，和 3 为默认，悬停状态和活动状态。在悬停/焦点/活动时，我们将具有较高 z-index 值的特定元素带到最前面，以显示它们在同级元素上的边界。

trans-unit.source: To help fit your needs, this works with <ul>-based markup, as shown above, or with any arbitrary “roll your own” markup. Note that if you’re using <nav>, you shouldn’t add role="tablist" directly to it, as this would override the element’s native role as a navigation landmark. Instead, switch to an alternative element (in the example below, a simple <div>) and wrap the <nav> around it.
trans-unit.target: 为了满足您的需求，它可以与基于 <ul> 的标记（如上所示）一起使用，也可以与任意“自己滚动”的标记一起使用。请注意，如果您使用的是 <nav> ，则不应直接在其中添加 role="tablist" ，因为这会覆盖该元素的本机角色作为导航界标。相反，请切换到其他元素（在下面的示例中为简单的 <div> ），然后将 <nav> 包装在其周围。

trans-unit.source: To nest your content with the default grid, add a new .row and set of .col-sm-* columns within an existing .col-sm-* column. Nested rows should include a set of columns that add up to 12 or fewer (it is not required that you use all 12 available columns).

trans-unit.source: To prevent any styles from leaking to nested tables, we use the child combinator (>) selector in our CSS. Since we need to target all the tds and ths in the thead, tbody, and tfoot, our selector would look pretty long without it. As such, we use the rather odd looking .table > :not(caption) > * > * selector to target all tds and ths of the .table, but none of any potential nested tables.
trans-unit.target: 为了防止任何样式泄漏到嵌套表，我们在CSS中使用子组合器（ > ）选择器。由于我们需要定位 thead ， tbody 和 tfoot 中的所有 td 和 th ，因此没有它，我们的选择器看起来会很长。因此，我们用很奇怪的看着 .table > :not(caption) > * > * 选择定位到所有 td S和 th 的第 .table ，但没有任何潜在的嵌套表。

trans-unit.source: Toasts
trans-unit.target: Toasts

trans-unit.source: Toasts are as flexible as you need and have very little required markup. At a minimum, we require a single element to contain your “toasted” content and strongly encourage a dismiss button.
trans-unit.target: 吐司随您需要而灵活，所需标记很少。至少，我们需要一个元素来包含您的“敬酒”内容，并强烈建议您使用关闭按钮。

trans-unit.source: Toasts are intended to be small interruptions to your visitors or users, so to help those with screen readers and similar assistive technologies, you should wrap your toasts in an aria-live region. Changes to live regions (such as injecting/updating a toast component) are automatically announced by screen readers without needing to move the user’s focus or otherwise interrupt the user. Additionally, include aria-atomic="true" to ensure that the entire toast is always announced as a single (atomic) unit, rather than announcing what was changed (which could lead to problems if you only update part of the toast’s content, or if displaying the same toast content at a later point in time). If the information needed is important for the process, e.g. for a list of errors in a form, then use the alert component instead of toast.
trans-unit.target: 吐司旨在对您的访问者或用户造成小小的干扰，因此，为了帮助那些拥有屏幕阅读器和类似辅助技术的人，您应该将吐司包装在一个 aria-live 地区。屏幕阅读器会自动宣布对活动区域的更改（例如注入/更新烤面包组件），而无需移动用户的焦点或以其他方式打扰用户。此外，包括 aria-atomic="true" 以确保整个烤面包始终以单个（原子）单位宣布，而不是宣布已更改的内容（如果仅更新部分烤面包的内容，或者稍后显示相同的烤面包内容，则可能会导致问题及时）。如果所需的信息对于该过程很重要，例如对于表单中的错误列表很重要，请使用警报组件而不是吐司。

trans-unit.source: Toasts are lightweight notifications designed to mimic the push notifications that have been popularized by mobile and desktop operating systems. They’re built with flexbox, so they’re easy to align and position.
trans-unit.target: 敬酒是一种轻量级的通知，旨在模仿已被移动和桌面操作系统普及的推送通知。它们是使用flexbox构建的，因此易于对齐和定位。

trans-unit.source: Toasts are opt-in for performance reasons, so you must initialize them yourself.
trans-unit.target: 由于性能原因，选择加入吐司，因此您必须自己进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Toasts are slightly translucent, too, so they blend over whatever they might appear over. For browsers that support the backdrop-filter CSS property, we’ll also attempt to blur the elements under a toast.
trans-unit.target: 吐司也有点半透明，因此它们融合了所有可能出现的东西。对于支持 backdrop-filter CSS属性的浏览器，我们还将尝试模糊祝酒下的元素。

trans-unit.source: Toggles a collapsible element to shown or hidden. Returns to the caller before the collapsible element has actually been shown or hidden (i.e. before the shown.bs.collapse or hidden.bs.collapse event occurs).

trans-unit.source: Toggles an element’s popover. Returns to the caller before the popover has actually been shown or hidden (i.e. before the shown.bs.popover or hidden.bs.popover event occurs). This is considered a “manual” triggering of the popover.

trans-unit.source: Traditional heading elements are designed to work best in the meat of your page content. When you need a heading to stand out, consider using a display heading—a larger, slightly more opinionated heading style.

trans-unit.source: Traditional heading elements are designed to work best in the meat of your page content. When you need a heading to stand out, consider using a display heading—a larger, slightly more opinionated heading style. Keep in mind these headings are not responsive by default, but it’s possible to enable responsive font sizes.
trans-unit.target: 传统的标题元素旨在最有效地处理您页面内容的内容。当您需要一个醒目的标题时，请考虑使用显示标题 -一种更大，更自觉的标题样式。请记住，这些标题默认情况下不响应，但是可以启用响应字体大小。

trans-unit.source: Update some browser default values to use rems instead of ems for scalable component spacing.
trans-unit.target: 更新一些浏览器默认值，以使用 rem 而不是 em 来扩展组件间距。

trans-unit.source: Updated grid mixins to utilize a make-col-ready prep mixin and a make-col to set the flex and max-width for individual column sizing.
trans-unit.target: 更新了网格混入程序，以利用可 make-col-ready 准备进行make-col的准备操作 mixin和 make-col 来设置单个列大小的 flex 和 max-width 。

trans-unit.source: Updated selector for input-based button groups. Instead of [data-toggle="buttons"] { } for style and behavior, we use the data attribute just for JS behaviors and rely on a new .btn-group-toggle class for styling.
trans-unit.target: 更新了基于输入的按钮组的选择器。取代 [data-toggle="buttons"] { } 的样式和行为，我们仅将 data 属性用于JS行为，并依靠新的 .btn-group-toggle 类进行样式设置。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Usage

trans-unit.source: Use border utilities to change just the border-color of a card. Note that you can put .text-{color} classes on the parent .card or a subset of the card’s contents as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 使用边框实用程序仅更改卡的 border-color 。请注意，您可以将 .text-{color} 类放在父 .card 或卡内容的子集上，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Use text and background utilities to change the appearance of a card.
trans-unit.target: 使用文本和背景实用程序来更改卡的外观。

trans-unit.source: Use flexbox utilities, float utilities, or text alignment utilities to place spinners exactly where you need them in any situation.
trans-unit.target: 在任何情况下，都可以使用flexbox实用程序，float实用程序或文本对齐实用程序将微调器精确放置在所需的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use margin utilities like .m-5 for easy spacing.
trans-unit.target: 使用诸如 .m-5 之类的边距实用工具可轻松实现间距。

trans-unit.source: Use $body-bg to set a background-color on the <body> (#fff by default).
trans-unit.target: 使用 $body-bg 在 <body> 上设置 background-color （默认为 #fff ）。

trans-unit.source: Use <a>s or <button>s to create actionable list group items with hover, disabled, and active states by adding .list-group-item-action. We separate these pseudo-classes to ensure list groups made of non-interactive elements (like <li>s or <div>s) don’t provide a click or tap affordance.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加 .list-group-item-action ,使用 <a> 或 <button> 来创建具有悬浮，禁用和活动状态的可操作列表组项目。我们将这些伪类分开，以确保由非交互式元素（如 <li> 或 <div> ）组成的列表组不提供点击或点击功能。

trans-unit.source: Use <pre>s for multiple lines of code. Once again, be sure to escape any angle brackets in the code for proper rendering. The <pre> element is reset to remove its margin-top and use rem units for its margin-bottom.
trans-unit.target: 对多行代码使用 <pre> 。再一次，请确保转义代码中的所有尖括号以进行正确渲染。所述 <pre> 元件被复位以除去其 margin-top 和使用 rem 单位其 margin-bottom 。

trans-unit.source: Use <pre>s for multiple lines of code. Once again, be sure to escape any angle brackets in the code for proper rendering. You may optionally add the .pre-scrollable class, which will set a max-height of 340px and provide a y-axis scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: 对多行代码使用 <pre> 。再一次，请确保转义代码中的所有尖括号以进行正确渲染。您可以选择添加 .pre-scrollable 类，该类会将max-height设置为340px，并提供y轴滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Use .container-fluid for a full width container, spanning the entire width of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 对整个宽度的容器使用 .container-fluid ，该容器跨越视口的整个宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use .flex-column to set a vertical direction, or .flex-column-reverse to start the vertical direction from the opposite side.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .flex-column 设置垂直方向，或使用 .flex-column-reverse 从相反的一侧开始垂直方向。

trans-unit.source: Use .flex-grow-* utilities to toggle a flex item’s ability to grow to fill available space. In the example below, the .flex-grow-1 elements uses all available space it can, while allowing the remaining two flex items their necessary space.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .flex-grow-* 实用程序可切换弹性项目增长以填充可用空间的能力。在下面的示例中， .flex-grow-1 元素将使用其所有可能的可用空间，同时为其余两个flex项目提供必要的空间。

trans-unit.source: Use .flex-row to set a horizontal direction (the browser default), or .flex-row-reverse to start the horizontal direction from the opposite side.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .flex-row 设置水平方向（浏览器默认），或使用 .flex-row-reverse 从相反的一侧开始水平方向。

trans-unit.source: Use .flex-shrink-* utilities to toggle a flex item’s ability to shrink if necessary. In the example below, the second flex item with .flex-shrink-1 is forced to wrap it’s contents to a new line, “shrinking” to allow more space for the previous flex item with .w-100.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，使用 .flex-shrink-* 实用程序切换弹性项目的收缩能力。在下面的示例中，具有 .flex-shrink-1 的第二个flex项目被强制将其内容包装到新行，“收缩”以为 .w-100 的前一个flex项目留出更多空间。

trans-unit.source: Use .flex-shrink-* utilities to toggle a flex item’s ability to shrink if necessary. In the example below, the second flex item with .flex-shrink-1 is forced to wrap its contents to a new line, “shrinking” to allow more space for the previous flex item with .w-100.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，使用 .flex-shrink-* 实用程序切换弹性项目的收缩能力。在以下示例中，具有 .flex-shrink-1 的第二个flex项目被强制将其内容包装到新行，“收缩”以为 .w-100 的前一个flex项目留出更多空间。

trans-unit.source: Use .order- classes for controlling the visual order of your content. These classes are responsive, so you can set the order by breakpoint (e.g., .order-1.order-md-2). Includes support for 1 through 12 across all five grid tiers.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .order- 类来控制内容的视觉顺序。这些类是响应式的，因此您可以按断点设置 order （例如 .order-1.order-md-2 ）。包括对所有五个网格层的 1 到 12 的支持。

trans-unit.source: Use .order- classes for controlling the visual order of your content. These classes are responsive, so you can set the order by breakpoint (e.g., .order-1.order-md-2). Includes support for 1 through 5 across all six grid tiers.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .order- 类来控制内容的视觉顺序。这些类是响应式的，因此您可以按断点设置 order （例如 .order-1.order-md-2 ）。包括对所有六个网格层中的 1 到 5 的支持。

trans-unit.source: Use .rounded-lg or .rounded-sm for larger or smaller border-radius.
trans-unit.target: 对于较大或较小的边界半径，请使用 .rounded-lg 或 .rounded-sm 。

trans-unit.source: Use .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl|-xxl} as needed to create responsive tables up to a particular breakpoint. From that breakpoint and up, the table will behave normally and not scroll horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要使用 .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl|-xxl} 创建直到特定断点的响应表。从该断点开始，该表将正常运行并且不会水平滚动。

trans-unit.source: Use .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl} as needed to create responsive tables up to a particular breakpoint. From that breakpoint and up, the table will behave normally and not scroll horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要使用 .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl} 创建直到特定断点的响应表。从该断点开始，该表将正常运行并且不会水平滚动。

trans-unit.source: Use .table-striped to add zebra-striping to any table row within the <tbody>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .table-striped 将斑马条纹添加到 <tbody> 中的任何表行。

trans-unit.source: Use align-content utilities on flexbox containers to align flex items together on the cross axis. Choose from start (browser default), end, center, between, around, or stretch. To demonstrate these utilities, we’ve enforced flex-wrap: wrap and increased the number of flex items.
trans-unit.target: 使用 align-content 上Flexbox的容器公用事业柔性物品排列在一起的横轴。从 start （浏览器默认值）， end ， center ， between ， around 或 stretch 。为了演示这些实用程序，我们强制执行了 flex-wrap: wrap 并增加了flex项目的数量。

trans-unit.source: Use align-items utilities on flexbox containers to change the alignment of flex items on the cross axis (the y-axis to start, x-axis if flex-direction: column). Choose from start, end, center, baseline, or stretch (browser default).
trans-unit.target: 在flexbox容器上使用 align-items 实用程序可更改弹性项目在横轴上的对齐方式（要开始的y轴，如果 flex-direction: column 则为x轴）。从 start ， end ， center ， baseline 或 stretch （浏览器默认）。

trans-unit.source: Use align-self utilities on flexbox items to individually change their alignment on the cross axis (the y-axis to start, x-axis if flex-direction: column). Choose from the same options as align-items: start, end, center, baseline, or stretch (browser default).
trans-unit.target: 在flexbox项上使用 align-self 实用程序可单独更改其在横轴（开始的y轴，如果 flex-direction: column 则为x轴）上的对齐方式。从与 align-items 相同的选项中选择： start ， end ， center ， baseline 或 stretch （浏览器默认值）。

trans-unit.source: Use col-{breakpoint}-auto classes to size columns based on the natural width of their content.
trans-unit.target: 使用 col-{breakpoint}-auto 类可根据列内容的自然宽度来调整列的大小。

trans-unit.source: Use data-bs-offset or data-bs-reference to change the location of the dropdown.
trans-unit.target: 使用 data-bs-offset 或 data-bs-reference 更改下拉菜单的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use data-offset or data-reference to change the location of the dropdown.
trans-unit.target: 使用 data-offset 或 data-reference 来更改下拉菜单的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use justify-content utilities on flexbox containers to change the alignment of flex items on the main axis (the x-axis to start, y-axis if flex-direction: column). Choose from start (browser default), end, center, between, around, or evenly.
trans-unit.target: 在flexbox容器上使用 justify-content 实用程序，以更改弹性项目在主轴上的对齐方式（要开始的x轴，如果 flex-direction: column 则为y轴）。从 start （浏览器默认）， end ， center ， between ， around 或 evenly 。

trans-unit.source: Use justify-content utilities on flexbox containers to change the alignment of flex items on the main axis (the x-axis to start, y-axis if flex-direction: column). Choose from start (browser default), end, center, between, or around.
trans-unit.target: 在flexbox容器上使用 justify-content 实用程序，以更改弹性项目在主轴上的对齐方式（要开始的x轴，如果 flex-direction: column 则为y轴）。从 start （浏览器默认）， end ， center ， between 或 around 。

trans-unit.source: Use Bootstrap’s JavaScript modal plugin to add dialogs to your site for lightboxes, user notifications, or completely custom content.
trans-unit.target: 使用Bootstrap的JavaScript模式插件将对话框添加到您的网站，以获取灯箱，用户通知或完全自定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: Use Bootstrap’s custom button styles for actions in forms, dialogs, and more with support for multiple sizes, states, and more.
trans-unit.target: 将Bootstrap的自定义按钮样式用于表单，对话框等中的操作，并支持多种尺寸，状态等。

trans-unit.source: Use a native font stack that selects the best font-family for each OS and device.
trans-unit.target: 使用本机字体堆栈为每个操作系统和设备选择最佳 font-family 。

trans-unit.source: Use a generic close icon for dismissing content like modals and alerts.
trans-unit.target: 使用通用的关闭图标来删除模式和警报等内容。

trans-unit.source: Use an ordered or unordered list with linked list items to create a minimally styled breadcrumb. Use our utilities to add additional styles as desired.
trans-unit.target: 使用有序或无序的列表和链接的列表项来创建一个最小样式的面包屑。根据需要使用我们的工具来添加额外的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use any of the responsive containers to change how wide the content in your navbar is presented.
trans-unit.target: 使用任何一个响应式容器来改变导航条中的内容的显示宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use background utility classes to change the appearance of individual progress bars.
trans-unit.target: 使用背景工具类来改变各个进度条的外观。

trans-unit.source: Use border utilities to add or remove an element’s borders. Choose from all borders or one at a time.
trans-unit.target: 使用边框实用程序添加或删除元素的边框。从所有边界中选择，或一次选择一个。

trans-unit.source: Use border utilities to quickly style the border and border-radius of an element. Great for images, buttons, or any other element.
trans-unit.target: 使用边框实用程序来快速设置元素的边框和边框半径。非常适用于图像、按钮或任何其他元素。

trans-unit.source: Use card groups to render cards as a single, attached element with equal width and height columns. Card groups start off stacked and use display: flex; to become attached with uniform dimensions starting at the sm breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用卡组将卡呈现为具有相等宽度和高度列的单个附加元素。卡组开始堆叠并使用 display: flex; 从 sm 断点开始以统一的尺寸连接。

trans-unit.source: Use card groups to render cards as a single, attached element with equal width and height columns. Card groups use display: flex; to achieve their uniform sizing.
trans-unit.target: 使用卡组将卡呈现为具有相等宽度和高度列的单个附加元素。卡组使用 display: flex; 实现他们的统一大小。

trans-unit.source: Use contextual classes to color table rows or individual cells.
trans-unit.target: 使用上下文类对表格行或单个单元格进行着色。

trans-unit.source: Use contextual classes to color tables, table rows or individual cells.
trans-unit.target: 使用上下文类对表格、表格行或单个单元格进行着色。

trans-unit.source: Use contextual classes to style list items with a stateful background and color.
trans-unit.target: 使用上下文类为列表项设置有状态的背景和颜色。

trans-unit.source: Use custom CSS in your stylesheets or as inline styles to set a width.
trans-unit.target: 在你的样式表中使用自定义CSS或作为内联样式来设置宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use data attributes to easily control the position of the carousel. data-bs-slide accepts the keywords prev or next, which alters the slide position relative to its current position. Alternatively, use data-bs-slide-to to pass a raw slide index to the carousel data-bs-slide-to="2", which shifts the slide position to a particular index beginning with 0.
trans-unit.target: 使用数据属性可以轻松控制转盘的位置。 data-bs-slide 接受关键字 prev 或 next ，这将相对于其当前位置更改幻灯片的位置。或者，使用 data-bs-slide-to 将原始幻灯片索引传递到轮播 data-bs-slide-to="2" ，这会将幻灯片位置移动到以 0 开头的特定索引。

trans-unit.source: Use data attributes to easily control the position of the carousel. data-slide accepts the keywords prev or next, which alters the slide position relative to its current position. Alternatively, use data-slide-to to pass a raw slide index to the carousel data-slide-to="2", which shifts the slide position to a particular index beginning with 0.
trans-unit.target: 使用数据属性可以轻松控制转盘的位置。 data-slide 接受关键字 prev 或 next ，这将相对于当前位置更改幻灯片位置。或者，使用 data-slide-to 将原始幻灯片索引传递给轮播 data-slide-to="2" 转盘上的data-slide-to =“ 2”，从而将幻灯片位置移动到以 0 开头的特定索引。

trans-unit.source: Use flexbox alignment utilities to vertically and horizontally align columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用flexbox对齐工具来垂直和水平对齐列。

trans-unit.source: Use flexbox alignment utilities to vertically and horizontally align columns. Internet Explorer 10-11 do not support vertical alignment of flex items when the flex container has a min-height as shown below.See Flexbugs #3 for more details.
trans-unit.target: 使用flexbox对齐工具可垂直和水平对齐列。当flex容器具有 min-height 时，Internet Explorer 10-11不支持flex项的垂直对齐，如下所示。有关更多详细信息，请参见Flexbugs＃3。

trans-unit.source: Use generated pseudo elements to make an element maintain the aspect ratio of your choosing. Perfect for responsively handling video or slideshow embeds based on the width of the parent.
trans-unit.target: 使用生成的伪元素来使元素保持你所选择的长宽比。完美地响应处理基于父体宽度的视频或幻灯片嵌入。

trans-unit.source: Use in HTML:
trans-unit.target: 在HTML中使用。

trans-unit.source: Use our display utilities for responsively toggling common values of the display property. Mix it with our grid system, content, or components to show or hide them across specific viewports.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的显示实用程序以响应方式切换 display 属性的常用值。将其与我们的网格系统，内容或组件混合以在特定视口中显示或隐藏它们。

trans-unit.source: Use our position utilities to place navbars in non-static positions. Choose from fixed to the top, fixed to the bottom, or stickied to the top (scrolls with the page until it reaches the top, then stays there). Fixed navbars use position: fixed, meaning they’re pulled from the normal flow of the DOM and may require custom CSS (e.g., padding-top on the <body>) to prevent overlap with other elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的位置工具将导航栏放置在非静态位置。从固定到顶部，固定到底部或固定在顶部进行选择（滚动页面直到到达顶部，然后停留在顶部）。固定的导航栏使用 position: fixed ，这意味着它们是从DOM的正常流程中拉出的，并且可能需要自定义CSS（例如， <body> 上的 padding-top ）以防止与其他元素重叠。

trans-unit.source: Use our spacing and flex utility classes for controlling spacing and alignment within navbars.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的间隔和柔性的实用工具类，用于控制导航栏内间隔和对齐。

trans-unit.source: Use our background utility classes to quickly change the appearance of a badge. Please note that when using Bootstrap’s default .bg-light, you’ll likely need a text color utility like .text-dark for proper styling. This is because background utilities do not set anything but background-color.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的后台实用程序类可以快速更改徽章的外观。请注意，在使用Bootstrap的默认 .bg-light 时，您可能需要使用文本颜色实用程序（如 .text-dark )来进行适当的样式设置。这是因为背景实用程序除了设置 background-color 之外没有设置其他任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Use our handful of available sizing utilities to quickly set a card’s width.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们少数可用的大小调整实用程序来快速设置卡片的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use our powerful mobile-first flexbox grid to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, five default responsive tiers, Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们强大的移动优先的flexbox网格来构建各种形状和尺寸的布局,这要归功于我们的12列系统、5个默认的响应层、Sass变量和混搭,以及数十种预定义的类。

trans-unit.source: Use our powerful mobile-first flexbox grid to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, six default responsive tiers, Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.

trans-unit.source: Use screen reader utilities to hide elements on all devices except screen readers.
trans-unit.target: 使用屏幕阅读器实用程序来隐藏除屏幕阅读器以外的所有设备上的元素。

trans-unit.source: Use spinners within buttons to indicate an action is currently processing or taking place. You may also swap the text out of the spinner element and utilize button text as needed.
trans-unit.target: 在按钮中使用微调器来表示当前正在处理或正在进行的操作。您也可以将文字从spinner元素中换出,并根据需要使用按钮文字。

trans-unit.source: Use text if you're worried about XSS attacks.
trans-unit.target: 如果你担心XSS攻击,请使用文本。

trans-unit.source: Use text utilities as needed to change the alignment of your blockquote.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要使用文本实用程序来改变你的区块引文的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Use the $font-family-base, $font-size-base, and $line-height-base attributes as our typographic base applied to the <body>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 $font-family-base ， $font-size-base 和 $line-height-base 属性作为应用于 <body> 的印刷基础。

trans-unit.source: Use the <kbd> to indicate input that is typically entered via keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <kbd> 表示通常通过键盘输入的输入。

trans-unit.source: Use the .alert-link utility class to quickly provide matching colored links within any alert.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .alert-link 实用程序类可在任何警报中快速提供匹配的彩色链接。

trans-unit.source: Use the .badge-pill modifier class to make badges more rounded (with a larger border-radius and additional horizontal padding). Useful if you miss the badges from v3.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .badge-pill 修饰符类可使徽章更圆（具有更大的 border-radius 和附加的水平 padding ）。如果您错过了v3的徽章，则很有用。

trans-unit.source: Use the .flex-fill class on a series of sibling elements to force them into widths equal to their content (or equal widths if their content does not surpass their border-boxes) while taking up all available horizontal space.
trans-unit.target: 在一系列同级元素上使用 .flex-fill 类，以使其占据等于其内容宽度的宽度（如果它们的内容不超出其边框的宽度，则使其宽度相等），同时占用所有可用的水平空间。

trans-unit.source: Use the .form-inline class to display a series of labels, form controls, and buttons on a single horizontal row. Form controls within inline forms vary slightly from their default states.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .form-inline 类可在单个水平行上显示一系列标签，表单控件和按钮。内联表单中的表单控件与其默认状态略有不同。

trans-unit.source: Use the .rounded-pill utility class to make badges more rounded with a larger border-radius.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .rounded-pill 实用程序类可以使徽章的 border-radius 更大，从而使徽章更圆。

trans-unit.source: Use the .text-hide class to maintain the accessibility and SEO benefits of heading tags, but want to utilize a background-image instead of text.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .text-hide 类可维护标题标签的可访问性和SEO优势，但要使用 background-image 代替文本。

trans-unit.source: Use the class option to change the class prefix used in the compiled CSS:
trans-unit.target: 使用 class 选项更改已编译CSS中使用的类前缀：

trans-unit.source: Use the focus trigger to dismiss popovers on the user’s next click of a different element than the toggle element.
trans-unit.target: 使用 focus 触发器可消除用户在下一次单击时与切换元素不同的元素上的弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: Use the margin and paddingspacing utilities to control how elements and components are spaced and sized. Bootstrap 4 includes a five-level scale for spacing utilities, based on a 1rem value default $spacer variable. Choose values for all viewports (e.g., .mr-3 for margin-right: 1rem), or pick responsive variants to target specific viewports (e.g., .mr-md-3 for margin-right: 1rem starting at the md breakpoint).
trans-unit.target: 使用 margin 和 padding 间距实用程序来控制元素和组件的间距和大小。 Bootstrap 4基于 1rem 值默认 $spacer 变量，包括五个级别的间距实用程序。选择所有视口的值（例如 .mr-3 表示 margin-right: 1rem ），或选择响应变体以特定视口为目标（例如 .mr-md-3 表示 margin-right: 1rem 从 md 断点开始）。

trans-unit.source: Use the margin and paddingspacing utilities to control how elements and components are spaced and sized. Bootstrap includes a six-level scale for spacing utilities, based on a 1rem value default $spacer variable. Choose values for all viewports (e.g., .me-3 for margin-right: 1rem in LTR), or pick responsive variants to target specific viewports (e.g., .me-md-3 for margin-right: 1rem —in LTR— starting at the md breakpoint).
trans-unit.target: 使用 margin 和 padding 间距实用程序来控制元素和组件的间距和大小。 Bootstrap基于 1rem 值默认 $spacer 变量，包括六个级别的间距实用程序。选择所有视口的值（例如， .me-3 表示 margin-right: 1rem LTR中为1rem），或选择响应变体以特定视口为目标（例如， .me-md-3 表示为 margin-right: 1rem （在LTR中），开始在 md 断点处）。

trans-unit.source: Use the state option to generate pseudo-class variations. Example pseudo-classes are :hover and :focus. When a list of states are provided, classnames are created for that pseudo-class. For example, to change opacity on hover, add state: hover and you’ll get .opacity-hover:hover in your compiled CSS.
trans-unit.target: 使用 state 选项生成伪类变体。伪类的示例是 :hover 和 :focus 。提供状态列表后，将为该伪类创建类名。例如，要更改悬停时的不透明度，请添加 state: hover ，您将在编译后的CSS中获得 .opacity-hover:hover 。

trans-unit.source: Use the Bootstrap grid system and its .row-cols classes to control how many grid columns (wrapped around your cards) you show per row. For example, here’s .row-cols-1 laying out the cards on one column, and .row-cols-md-2 splitting four cards to equal width across multiple rows, from the medium breakpoint up.
trans-unit.target: 使用Bootstrap网格系统及其 .row-cols 类来控制每行显示多少个网格列（包装在卡上）。例如，这里的 .row-cols-1 将卡片 .row-cols-md-2 在一列上，而.row-cols-md-2从中等的断点开始将四张卡片以相等的宽度分布在多行中。

trans-unit.source: Use the border spinners for a lightweight loading indicator.
trans-unit.target: 使用边框旋转器作为轻量级的加载指示器。

trans-unit.source: Use the included .figure , .figure-img and .figure-caption classes to provide some baseline styles for the HTML5 <figure> and <figcaption> elements. Images in figures have no explicit size, so be sure to add the .img-fluid class to your <img> to make it responsive.
trans-unit.target: 使用随附的 .figure ， .figure-img 和 .figure-caption 类可为HTML5 <figure> 和 <figcaption> 元素提供一些基线样式。图中的图像没有明确的大小，因此请确保将 .img-fluid 类添加到 <img> 中以使其具有响应能力。

trans-unit.source: Use the ratio helper to manage the aspect ratios of external content like <iframe>s, <embed>s, <video>s, and <object>s. These helpers also can be used on any standard HTML child element (e.g., a <div> or <img>). Styles are applied from the parent .ratio class directly to the child.
trans-unit.target: 使用比率帮助器来管理外部内容（如 <iframe> ， <embed> ， <video> 和 <object> )的长宽比。这些帮助程序也可以在任何标准HTML子元素（例如 <div> 或 <img> ）上使用。样式从父 .ratio 类直接应用于子项。

trans-unit.source: Use the responsive .row-cols-* classes to quickly set the number of columns that best render your content and layout. Whereas normal .col-* classes apply to the individual columns (e.g., .col-md-4), the row columns classes are set on the parent .row as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 使用响应式 .row-cols-* 类可快速设置最能呈现内容和布局的列数。普通的 .col-* 类适用于各个列（例如 .col-md-4 ），而行列类是在父 .row 上设置的快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: Use the responsive .row-cols-* classes to quickly set the number of columns that best render your content and layout. Whereas normal .col-* classes apply to the individual columns (e.g., .col-md-4), the row columns classes are set on the parent .row as a shortcut. With .row-cols-auto you can give the columns their natural width.
trans-unit.target: 使用响应式 .row-cols-* 类可快速设置最能呈现您的内容和布局的列数。普通的 .col-* 类适用于各个列（例如 .col-md-4 ），而行列类是在父 .row 上设置的快捷方式。使用 .row-cols-auto ,您可以为列指定其自然宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use the scaling classes for larger or smaller rounded corners. Sizes range from 0 to 3, and can be configured by modifying the utilities API.
trans-unit.target: 将缩放等级用于较大或较小的圆角。大小范围为 0 到 3 ，可以通过修改实用程序API进行配置。

trans-unit.source: Using a combination of grid and utility classes, cards can be made horizontal in a mobile-friendly and responsive way. trans-unit.source: Using color to add meaning only provides a visual indication, which will not be conveyed to users of assistive technologies – such as screen readers. Ensure that information denoted by the color is either obvious from the content itself (e.g. the visible text), or is included through alternative means, such as additional text hidden with the .sr-only class.
trans-unit.target: 使用颜色添加含义仅提供视觉指示，而不会传达给辅助技术的用户（例如屏幕阅读器）。确保用颜色表示的信息从内容本身来看是显而易见的（例如，可见文本），或者是通过其他方式包括的，例如用 .sr-only 类隐藏的其他文本。

trans-unit.source: Utility API

trans-unit.source: Utility classes that change how users interact with contents of a website.
trans-unit.target: 用于改变用户与网站内容的交互方式的实用类。

trans-unit.source: Utilize breakpoint-specific column classes for easy column sizing without an explicit numbered class like .col-sm-6.
trans-unit.target: 利用特定于断点的列类来简化列大小，而无需使用显式编号的类，例如 .col-sm-6 。

trans-unit.source: Utilize our source Sass files to take advantage of variables, maps, mixins, and more. In our build we’ve increased the Sass rounding precision to 6 (by default it’s 5) to prevent issues with browser rounding.
trans-unit.target: 利用我们的源Sass文件来利用变量，映射，mixins等。在我们的构建中，我们已将Sass舍入精度提高到6（默认为5），以防止浏览器舍入问题。

trans-unit.source: Utilize the .text-hide class or mixin to help replace an element’s text content with a background image.
trans-unit.target: 利用 .text-hide 类或mixin帮助使用背景图像替换元素的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: Utilize the Bootstrap grid system within a modal by nesting .container-fluid within the .modal-body. Then, use the normal grid system classes as you would anywhere else.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 .container-fluid 嵌套在 .modal-body 中,在模式中利用Bootstrap网格系统。然后，像在其他任何地方一样使用普通的网格系统类。

trans-unit.source: Validation
trans-unit.target: Validation

trans-unit.source: Validation states can be customized via Sass with the $form-validation-states map. Located in our _variables.scss file, this Sass map is looped over to generate the default valid/invalid validation states. Included is a nested map for customizing each state’s color and icon. While no other states are supported by browsers, those using custom styles can easily add more complex form feedback.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过Sass使用 $form-validation-states 映射来自定义验证状态。位于我们的 _variables.scss 文件中，此Sass映射被循环生成默认的 valid / invalid 验证状态。包括一个用于自定义每个州的颜色和图标的嵌套地图。虽然浏览器不支持其他状态，但是使用自定义样式的浏览器可以轻松添加更复杂的表单反馈。

trans-unit.source: Validation styles are available for the following form controls and components:
trans-unit.target: 以下表单控件和组件可使用验证样式。

trans-unit.source: Validation styles are now supported, as are multiple inputs (though you can only validate one input per group).
trans-unit.target: 现在支持验证样式,也支持多个输入(尽管每个组只能验证一个输入)。

trans-unit.source: Variable for the class name if you don’t want it to be the same as the property. In case you don’t provide the class key and property key is an array of strings, the class name will be the first element of the property array.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不希望类名与属性相同，则为该类名的变量。如果您不提供 class 键，而 property 键是字符串数组，则类名将是 property 数组的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Variable overrides within the same Sass file can come before or after the default variables. However, when overriding across Sass files, your overrides must come before you import Bootstrap’s Sass files.
trans-unit.target: 同一Sass文件中的变量覆盖可以在默认变量之前或之后。但是，当跨Sass文件覆盖时，必须在导入Bootstrap的Sass文件之前进行覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Variables and maps determine the number of columns, the gutter width, and the media query point at which to begin floating columns. We use these to generate the predefined grid classes documented above, as well as for the custom mixins listed below.
trans-unit.target: 变量和地图决定了列的数量、沟槽宽度和开始浮动列的媒体查询点。我们使用这些变量和地图来生成上面记录的预定义网格类,以及下面列出的自定义混搭。

trans-unit.target: 通过混合 align-items ， flex-direction: column 和 margin-top: auto 或 margin-bottom: auto 将一个flex项目垂直移动到容器的顶部或底部。

trans-unit.source: Via data attributes
trans-unit.target: 通过数据属性

trans-unit.source: Via data attributes or JavaScript, the dropdown plugin toggles hidden content (dropdown menus) by toggling the .show class on the parent .dropdown-menu. The data-bs-toggle="dropdown" attribute is relied on for closing dropdown menus at an application level, so it’s a good idea to always use it.
trans-unit.target: 通过数据属性或JavaScript，下拉插件通过在父 .dropdown-menu 上切换 .show 类来切换隐藏的内容（下拉菜单）。该 data-bs-toggle="dropdown" 属性依赖于在应用程序级别关闭下拉菜单，所以这是一个好主意，可以经常使用。

trans-unit.source: Via data attributes or JavaScript, the dropdown plugin toggles hidden content (dropdown menus) by toggling the .show class on the parent list item. The data-toggle="dropdown" attribute is relied on for closing dropdown menus at an application level, so it’s a good idea to always use it.
trans-unit.target: 通过数据属性或JavaScript，下拉插件通过切换父列表项上的 .show 类来切换隐藏内容（下拉菜单）。该 data-toggle="dropdown" 属性依赖于在应用程序级别关闭下拉菜单，所以这是一个好主意，可以经常使用。

trans-unit.target: 仅在md上可见
