trans-unit.source: Visually hidden content
trans-unit.target: 视觉上隐藏的内容

trans-unit.source: Visually hide an element while still allowing it to be exposed to assistive technologies (such as screen readers) with .visually-hidden. Use .visually-hidden-focusable to visually hide an element by default, but to display it when it’s focused (e.g. by a keyboard-only user). Can also be used as mixins.
trans-unit.target: 在视觉上隐藏元素，同时仍允许其使用 .visually-hidden 暴露于辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器）。默认情况下，使用 .visually-hidden-focusable 可视化隐藏元素，但是在聚焦时显示该元素（例如，仅使用键盘的用户）。也可以用作mixin。

trans-unit.source: Visually, these toggle buttons are identical to the checkbox toggle buttons. However, they are conveyed differently by assistive technologies: the checkbox toggles will be announced by screen readers as “checked”/“not checked” (since, despite their appearance, they are fundamentally still checkboxes), whereas these toggle buttons will be announced as “button”/“button pressed”. The choice between these two approaches will depend on the type of toggle you are creating, and whether or not the toggle will make sense to users when announced as a checkbox or as an actual button.
trans-unit.target: 在视觉上，这些切换按钮与复选框切换按钮相同。但是，它们在辅助技术上的传达方式有所不同：复选框切换将由屏幕阅读器宣布为“已选中” /“未选中”（因为尽管它们出现了，但它们在本质上仍是复选框），而这些切换按钮将被声明为“按钮” /“按钮按下”。这两种方法之间的选择将取决于您要创建的切换类型，以及当宣布为复选框或实际按钮时，切换是否对用户有意义。

trans-unit.source: Want to see an example? Check out this JS Bin demo.
trans-unit.target: 想看个例子吗？查看此JS Bin演示。

trans-unit.source: Warning
trans-unit.target: Warning

trans-unit.source: We also believe you should be able to use all Bootstrap plugins purely through the JavaScript API. All public APIs are single, chainable methods, and return the collection acted upon.
trans-unit.target: 我们也相信,你应该能够纯粹通过JavaScript API来使用所有Bootstrap插件。所有的公共API都是单一的、可链式的方法,并返回所作用的集合。

trans-unit.source: We also have another function for getting a particular level of color from the $theme-colors map. Negative level values will lighten the color, while higher levels will darken.
trans-unit.target: 我们还具有另一个功能，可从 $theme-colors 映射中获取特定级别的颜色。负级别值将使颜色变亮，而更高级别将使颜色变暗。

trans-unit.source: We currently recommend using custom validation styles, as native browser default validation messages are not consistently exposed to assistive technologies in all browsers (most notably, Chrome on desktop and mobile).
trans-unit.target: 我们目前建议使用自定义验证样式,因为原生浏览器的默认验证信息并不是一致地暴露在所有浏览器中的辅助技术中(最明显的是,桌面和移动端的Chrome浏览器)。

trans-unit.source: We don’t encourage customization of these individual values; should you change one, you likely need to change them all.
trans-unit.target: 我们不鼓励定制这些个人价值观；如果您要更改一个，则可能需要全部更改。

trans-unit.source: We hide the default <input> with opacity and use the .custom-control-label to build a new custom form indicator in its place with ::before and ::after. Unfortunately we can’t build a custom one from just the <input> because CSS’s content doesn’t work on that element.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用 opacity 隐藏默认的 <input> ，并使用 .custom-control-label 在 ::before 和 ::after 的位置构建一个新的自定义表单指示符。不幸的是，我们不能仅从 <input> 构建自定义对象，因为CSS的 content 不适用于该元素。

trans-unit.source: We hide the default file <input> via opacity and instead style the <label>. The button is generated and positioned with ::after. Lastly, we declare a width and height on the <input> for proper spacing for surrounding content.
trans-unit.target: 我们通过 opacity 隐藏默认文件 <input> ，而设置 <label> 的样式。该按钮已生成并通过 ::after 定位。最后，我们在 <input> 上声明 width 和 height ，以为周围的内容提供适当的间距。

trans-unit.source: We maintain the list of browsers supported through Autoprefixer in a separate file within our GitHub repository. See .browserslistrc for details.
trans-unit.target: 我们将通过Autoprefixer支持的浏览器列表保存在GitHub存储库中的单独文件中。有关详细信息，请参见.browserslistrc。

trans-unit.source: We maintain the list of browsers supported through Autoprefixer in a separate file within our GitHub repository. See .browserslistrc for details.
trans-unit.target: 我们将通过Autoprefixer支持的浏览器列表保存在GitHub存储库中的单独文件中。有关详细信息，请参见.browserslistrc。

trans-unit.source: We moved from regular CSS to SCSS to take full advantage of Bootstrap’s variables, mixins, and more.
trans-unit.target: 我们从常规CSS迁移到SCSS，以充分利用Bootstrap的变量，mixin等。

trans-unit.source: We occasionally use media queries that go in the other direction (the given screen size or smaller):
trans-unit.target: 有时我们会使用其他方向的媒体查询（给定的屏幕尺寸或更小）：

trans-unit.source: We only set a height value on the .progress, so if you change that value the inner .progress-bar will automatically resize accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 我们仅在 .progress 上设置一个 height 值，因此，如果更改该值，则内部 .progress-bar 会自动相应地调整大小。

trans-unit.source: We provide a version of Bootstrap built as ESM (bootstrap.esm.js and bootstrap.esm.min.js) which allows you to use Bootstrap as a module in your browser, if your targeted browsers support it.
trans-unit.target: 我们提供了一个构建为 ESM 的Bootstrap版本（ bootstrap.esm.js 和 bootstrap.esm.min.js ），如果目标浏览器支持的话，它可以将Bootstrap用作浏览器中的模块。

trans-unit.source: We recommend getting familiar with Bootstrap first by reading through our Getting Started Introduction page. Once you’ve run through it, continue reading here for how to enable RTL.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议您先阅读我们的“入门指南”页面，以熟悉Bootstrap 。阅读完之后，请继续阅读此处以了解如何启用RTL。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using position: sticky instead. See the HTML5 Please entry for details and specific polyfill recommendations. One suggestion is to use an @supports rule for implementing it (e.g., @supports (position: sticky) { ... })
trans-unit.target: 我们建议改用 position: sticky 。有关详细信息和特定的polyfill建议，请参见HTML5 Please条目。一种建议是使用 @supports 规则来实现它（例如， @supports (position: sticky) { ... } ）

trans-unit.source: We recommend using client-side validation, but in case you require server-side validation, you can indicate invalid and valid form fields with .is-invalid and .is-valid. Note that .invalid-feedback is also supported with these classes.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议使用客户端验证，但是如果您需要服务器端验证，则可以使用 .is-invalid 和 .is-valid 指示无效和有效的表单字段。请注意，这些类也支持 .invalid-feedback 。

trans-unit.source: We start by setting the background of a table cell with the --bs-table-bg custom property. All table variants then set that custom property to colorize the table cells. This way, we don’t get into trouble if semi-transparent colors are used as table backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: 我们首先使用 --bs-table-bg 自定义属性设置表格单元格的背景。然后，所有表变体都设置该自定义属性以使表单元格着色。这样，如果将半透明的颜色用作表格背景，我们就不会遇到麻烦。

trans-unit.source: We use jQuery’s slim build, but the full version is also supported.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用jQuery的slim版本，但也支持完整版本。

trans-unit.source: We use Autoprefixer to handle intended browser support via CSS prefixes, which uses Browserslist to manage these browser versions. Consult their documentation for how to integrate these tools into your projects.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用Autoprefixer通过CSS前缀处理预期的浏览器支持，而CSS前缀使用Browserslist来管理这些浏览器版本。请查阅他们的文档，以了解如何将这些工具集成到您的项目中。

trans-unit.source: We use a large block of connected links for our pagination, making links hard to miss and easily scalable—all while providing large hit areas. Pagination is built with list HTML elements so screen readers can announce the number of available links. Use a wrapping <nav> element to identify it as a navigation section to screen readers and other assistive technologies.
trans-unit.target: 我们在分页中使用了大量的连接链接，从而使链接不易丢失且易于扩展-同时还提供了较大的点击范围。分页是使用列表HTML元素构建的，因此屏幕阅读器可以宣布可用链接的数量。使用包装的 <nav> 元素将其标识为屏幕阅读器和其他辅助技术的导航部分。

trans-unit.source: We use a subset of all colors to create a smaller color palette for generating color schemes, also available as Sass variables and a Sass map in Bootstrap’s scss/_variables.scss file.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用所有颜色的子集来创建较小的调色板以生成配色方案，也可以在Bootstrap的 scss/_variables.scss 文件中将其作为Sass变量和Sass映射使用。

trans-unit.source: We use the .progress as a wrapper to indicate the max value of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用 .progress 作为包装器来指示进度条的最大值。

trans-unit.source: We use the add and subtract functions to wrap the CSS calc function. The primary purpose of these functions is to avoid errors when a “unitless” 0 value is passed into a calc expression. Expressions like calc(10px - 0) will return an error in all browsers, despite being mathematically correct.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用 add 和 subtract 函数包裹CSS calc 功能。这些函数的主要目的是避免将“无单位” 0 值传递给 calc 表达式时发生错误。尽管在数学上是正确的，但诸如 calc(10px - 0) 类的表达式将在所有浏览器中返回错误。

trans-unit.source: We use the escape-svg function to escape the <, > and # characters for SVG background images. These characters need to be escaped to properly render the background images in IE.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用 escape-svg 函数对SVG背景图像的 < ， > 和 # 字符进行转义。这些字符需要转义以正确显示IE中的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: We use the inner .progress-bar to indicate the progress so far.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用内部的 .progress-bar 指示到目前为止的进度。

trans-unit.source: We use the sibling selector (~) for all our <input> states—like :checked—to properly style our custom form indicator. When combined with the .custom-control-label class, we can also style the text for each item based on the <input>’s state.
trans-unit.target: 我们对所有 <input> 状态（如 :checked ）使用同级选择器（ ~ ），以正确设置自定义表单指示符的样式。当与 .custom-control-label 类结合使用时，我们还可以根据 <input> 的状态为每个项目设置文本样式。

trans-unit.source: We use this extra class to reduce the horizontal padding on either side of the caret by 25% and remove the margin-left that’s added for regular button dropdowns. Those extra changes keep the caret centered in the split button and provide a more appropriately sized hit area next to the main button.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用此额外的类将插入符两侧的水平 padding 减少25％，并删除为常规按钮下拉菜单添加 margin-left 。这些额外的更改将插入符号保持在拆分按钮的中心，并在主按钮旁边提供了一个更适当大小的命中区域。

trans-unit.source: We’re still using Jekyll, but we have plugins in the mix:
trans-unit.target: 我们仍在使用Jekyll，但是我们有一些插件：

trans-unit.source: When $enable-gradients is set to true (default is false), you can use .bg-gradient- utility classes. Learn about our Sass options to enable these classes and more.
trans-unit.target: 当 $enable-gradients 设置为 true （默认值为 false ）时，可以使用 .bg-gradient- Utility类。了解我们的Sass选项以启用这些课程以及更多内容。

trans-unit.source: When auto is specified, it will dynamically reorient the popover.
trans-unit.target: 当 auto 被指定，它会动态地重新调整酥料饼。

trans-unit.source: When auto is specified, it will dynamically reorient the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 当 auto 被指定，它会动态地重新调整提示。

trans-unit.source: When a function is used to determine the offset, it is called with an object containing the offset data as its first argument. The function must return an object with the same structure. The triggering element DOM node is passed as the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 当使用一个函数来确定偏移量时,它的第一个参数是一个包含偏移量数据的对象。函数必须返回一个具有相同结构的对象。触发元素DOM节点作为第二个参数传递。

trans-unit.source: When a function is used to determine the placement, it is called with the popover DOM node as its first argument and the triggering element DOM node as its second. The this context is set to the popover instance.
trans-unit.target: 当使用函数确定放置位置时，将以popover DOM节点作为第一个参数，并以触发元素DOM节点作为第二个参数来调用它。在 this 情况下被设置为酥料饼的实例。

trans-unit.source: When a function is used to determine the placement, it is called with the tooltip DOM node as its first argument and the triggering element DOM node as its second. The this context is set to the tooltip instance.
trans-unit.target: 当使用函数确定放置位置时，将以工具提示DOM节点作为第一个参数，并以触发元素DOM节点作为第二个参数来调用它。在 this 情况下被设置为提示实例。

trans-unit.source: When an alert is dismissed, the element is completely removed from the page structure. If a keyboard user dismisses the alert using the close button, their focus will suddenly be lost and, depending on the browser, reset to the start of the page/document. For this reason, we recommend including additional JavaScript that listens for the closed.bs.alert event and programmatically sets focus() to the most appropriate location in the page. If you’re planning to move focus to a non-interactive element that normally does not receive focus, make sure to add tabindex="-1" to the element.
trans-unit.target: 解除警报后，该元素将从页面结构中完全删除。如果键盘用户使用“关闭”按钮取消了警报，则他们的焦点将突然丢失，并且取决于浏览器，重置为页面/文档的开头。出于这个原因，我们建议您包含其他JavaScript，这些JavaScript侦听 closed.bs.alert 事件，并以编程方式将 focus() 设置为页面中最合适的位置。如果您打算将焦点移到通常不会获得焦点的非交互式元素，请确保将 tabindex="-1" 到该元素。

trans-unit.source: When backdrop is set to static, the modal will not close when clicking outside it. Click the button below to try it.
trans-unit.target: 当背景设置为静态时,在其外点击模态将不会关闭。点击下面的按钮试试。

trans-unit.source: When completed, you’ll be able to run the various commands provided from the command line.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，您将能够运行命令行中提供的各种命令。

trans-unit.source: When either .table-striped, .table-hover or .table-active classes are added, the --bs-table-accent-bg is set to a semitransparent color to colorize the background.
trans-unit.target: 当添加 .table-striped ， .table-hover 或 .table-active 类时，-- --bs-table-accent-bg 设置为半透明颜色以使背景着色。

trans-unit.source: When it comes to customization, the preferred way is to take advantage of variables, maps, and mixins. This approach works the same for RTL, even if it’s post-processed from the compiled files, thanks to how RTLCSS works.
trans-unit.target: 关于定制，首选方法是利用变量，映射和混合。由于RTLCSS的工作原理，即使从编译的文件中进行了后处理，该方法对于RTL也是一样的。

trans-unit.source: When making any changes to the Sass variables or maps, you’ll need to save your changes and recompile. Doing so will output a brand new set of predefined grid classes for column widths, offsets, and ordering. Responsive visibility utilities will also be updated to use the custom breakpoints. Make sure to set grid values in px (not rem, em, or %).
trans-unit.target: 对Sass变量或映射进行任何更改时，您需要保存更改并重新编译。这样做将为列宽，偏移量和顺序输出一组全新的预定义网格类。响应性可见性实用程序也将更新为使用自定义断点。确保以 px 为单位设置网格值（不是 rem ， em 或 % ）。

trans-unit.source: When modals become too long for the user’s viewport or device, they scroll independent of the page itself. Try the demo below to see what we mean.
trans-unit.target: 当模式对于用户的视口或设备而言变得太长时，它们将独立于页面本身滚动。请尝试下面的演示，以了解我们的意思。

trans-unit.source: When modifying via Sass, the quote function is required to generate the quotes around a string. For example, using > as the divider, you can use this:
trans-unit.target: 通过Sass进行修改时，需要使用quote函数生成字符串周围的引号。例如，使用 > 作为分隔符，可以使用以下命令：

trans-unit.source: When showing a new tab, the events fire in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 当显示一个新的标签时,事件按以下顺序触发。

trans-unit.source: When spying on elements other than the <body>, be sure to have a height set and overflow-y: scroll; applied.
trans-unit.target: 当监视除 <body> 以外的元素时，请确保已设置 height 并 overflow-y: scroll; 应用。

trans-unit.source: When successfully implemented, your nav or list group will update accordingly, moving the .active class from one item to the next based on their associated targets.
trans-unit.target: 成功实施后，您的导航或列表组将相应地进行更新，并根据其相关目标将 .active 类从一项移至下一项。

trans-unit.source: When the container is within your navbar, its horizontal padding is removed at breakpoints lower than your specified .navbar-expand{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl} class. This ensures we’re not doubling up on padding unnecessarily on lower viewports when your navbar is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 当容器位于导航 .navbar-expand{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl} ，其水平填充将在低于指定的.navbar-expand {-sm | -md | -lg | -xl}类的断点处删除。这样可以确保在导航栏合拢时，我们不会在不必要的情况下在较低视口上加倍填充。

trans-unit.source: When toggling display isn’t needed, you can toggle the visibility of an element with our visibility utilities. Invisible elements will still affect the layout of the page, but are visually hidden from visitors.
trans-unit.target: 当不需要切换 display ，您可以使用 visibility 性实用程序来切换元素的可见性。不可见的元素仍然会影响页面的布局，但在视觉上对访问者是隐藏的。

trans-unit.source: When triggered from anchors that wrap across multiple lines, popovers will be centered between the anchors’ overall width. Use .text-nowrap on your <a>s to avoid this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 从跨越多行的锚点触发时，弹出窗口将在锚点的整体宽度之间居中。在您的 <a> 上使用 .text-nowrap 可以避免这种情况。

trans-unit.source: When triggered from anchors that wrap across multiple lines, popovers will be centered between the anchors' overall width. Use .text-nowrap on your <a>s to avoid this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 从跨越多行的锚点触发时，弹出窗口将在锚点的整体宽度之间居中。在您的 <a> 上使用 .text-nowrap 可以避免这种情况。

trans-unit.source: When triggered from hyperlinks that span multiple lines, tooltips will be centered. Use white-space: nowrap; on your <a>s to avoid this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 从跨越多行的超链接触发时，工具提示将居中。使用 white-space: nowrap; 在您的 <a> 上避免这种行为。

trans-unit.source: When using autohide: false, you must add a close button to allow users to dismiss the toast.
trans-unit.target: 使用 autohide: false ，必须添加一个关闭按钮，以允许用户消除烤面包。

trans-unit.source: When using display: grid, you can make use of gap utilities on the parent grid container. This can save on having to add margin utilities to individual grid items (children of a display: grid container). Gap utilities are responsive by default, and are generated via our utilities API, based on the $spacers Sass map.
trans-unit.target: 使用 display: grid ，可以在父网格容器上使用 gap 工具。这样可以省去向单个网格项目（ display: grid 容器）添加边距实用程序的麻烦。Gap实用程序默认情况下是响应式的，并且是通过我们的实用程序API根据 $spacers Sass映射生成的。

trans-unit.source: When using Bootstrap’s source Sass files, you have the option of using Sass variables and mixins to create custom, semantic, and responsive page layouts. Our predefined grid classes use these same variables and mixins to provide a whole suite of ready-to-use classes for fast responsive layouts.
trans-unit.target: 使用Bootstrap的源Sass文件时，可以选择使用Sass变量和mixins创建自定义，语义和响应式页面布局。我们预定义的网格类使用这些相同的变量和mixin为快速响应的布局提供了一整套现成的类。

trans-unit.source: When using a <nav>-based navigation, be sure to include .nav-item on the anchors.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于 <nav> 的导航时，请确保在锚点上包括 .nav-item 。

trans-unit.source: When using a <nav>-based navigation, you can safely omit .nav-item as only .nav-link is required for styling <a> elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于 <nav> 的导航时，可以安全地省略 .nav-item ，因为样式 <a> 元素仅需要 .nav-link 。

trans-unit.source: When using button classes on <a> elements that are used to trigger in-page functionality (like collapsing content), rather than linking to new pages or sections within the current page, these links should be given a role="button" to appropriately convey their purpose to assistive technologies such as screen readers.
trans-unit.target: 当使用按钮类 <a> 了用于触发在网页内的功能（如折叠含量）的元素，而不是连接到当前页内新的页面或部分，这些链接应给予 role="button" ，以适当地将其目的传达给辅助技术，例如屏幕阅读器。

trans-unit.source: When using card groups with footers, their content will automatically line up.
trans-unit.target: 当使用带页脚的卡片组时,它们的内容会自动对齐。

trans-unit.source: When using scrollspy in conjunction with adding or removing of elements from the DOM, you’ll need to call the refresh method like so:
trans-unit.target: 当结合使用scrollspy和从DOM中添加或删除元素时，您需要像这样调用refresh方法：

trans-unit.source: When you do this, we recommend including additional JavaScript to move the focus programmatically to the container when it is opened. Otherwise, keyboard users and users of assistive technologies will likely have a hard time finding the newly revealed content - particularly if the container that was opened comes before the toggler in the document’s structure. We also recommend making sure that the toggler has the aria-controls attribute, pointing to the id of the content container. In theory, this allows assistive technology users to jump directly from the toggler to the container it controls–but support for this is currently quite patchy.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作时，建议您添加其他JavaScript，以便在打开容器时以编程方式将焦点移到容器上。否则，键盘用户和辅助技术用户可能会很难找到新显示的内容-特别是如果打开的容器在文档结构中的切换器之前。我们还建议确保切换器具有 aria-controls 属性，指向内容容器的 id 。从理论上讲，这允许辅助技术用户直接从切换器跳到其控制的容器中-但是对此的支持目前还很少。

trans-unit.source: When you don’t want to use the includes, there are also two functions:
trans-unit.target: 当您不想使用包含时，还有两个功能：

trans-unit.source: When you have multiple toasts, we default to vertically stacking them in a readable manner.
trans-unit.target: 当你有多个吐司时,我们默认以可读的方式垂直堆叠它们。

trans-unit.source: When you have some styles on a parent element that interfere with a popover, you’ll want to specify a custom container so that the popover’s HTML appears within that element instead.
trans-unit.target: 当父元素上的某些样式会干扰弹出框时，您将需要指定一个自定义 container ，以使弹出框的HTML出现在该元素内。

trans-unit.source: When you need equal height, add .h-100 to the cards. If you want equal heights by default, you can set $card-height: 100% in Sass.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要相等的高度时，请在卡片上添加 .h-100 。如果默认情况下想要相等的高度，则可以在Sass中设置 $card-height: 100% 。
